samples.instruction: 请总结以下计算机科学论文的核心内容。
samples.input:
turbulent convection is one of the major uncertainties in our understanding of stellar properties . as a very efficient mixing process and energy transfer mechanism 
 , it affects the stellar structure and evolution significantly . because of its high non - linearity and complexity 
 , we can not solve the turbulent flows analytically at present . 
 since @xcite established the first practical model of stellar structure , a lot of effort has been made to study the problems of stellar convection ...
samples.reference:
an attempt at understanding the downward overshooting in the convective envelopes of the post - main - sequence stars has been made on the basis of three - dimensional large eddy simulations , using artificially modified opal opacity and taking into account radiation and ionization in the equation of state . 
 two types of stars , an intermediate mass star and a massive star were considered . to avoid the long thermal relaxation time of the intermediate mass star 
 , we increased the stellar energy flux artificially while trying to maintain a structure close to the one given by one - dimensional stellar model . 
 a parametric study of the flux factor was performed . for the massive star , 
 no such manner was necessary . 
 numerical results were analyzed when the system reached the statistical steady state . 
 it was shown that the penetration distance in pressure scale heights is of the order of unit . 
 the scaling relations among the penetration distance , input flux and vertical velocity fluctuations studied by singh et al . 
 ( 1998 ) were checked . 
 the anisotropy of the turbulent convection and the diffusion models of third order moments representing the non - local transports were also investigated . 
 these models are dramatically affected by the velocity fields and no universal constant parameters seem to exist . 
 the limitation of the numerical results was discussed as well . 
 [ firstpage ]    convection  hydrodynamics  turbulence  methods : numerical  stars : interiors .

samples.instruction: 将下文翻译成中文，注意保留技术术语。
samples.input: Training large language models (LLMs) involves a multi-stage pipeline that integrates large-scale data processing, neural network optimization, and advanced learning paradigms. The process typically begins with unsupervised or self-supervised pretraining on massive corpora of text, where transformer-based architectures learn statistical patterns of language via objectives such as next-token prediction or masked language modeling. This stage relies heavily on stochastic gradient descent variants,...
samples.reference:
大型语言模型（LLMs）的训练涉及一个多阶段的流水线过程，融合了大规模数据处理、神经网络优化以及先进的学习范式。该过程通常始于在海量文本语料上的无监督或自监督预训练，在这一阶段，基于 Transformer 的架构通过诸如下一个 token 预测（next-token prediction）或掩码语言建模（masked language modeling）等目标来学习语言的统计规律。此阶段高度依赖随机梯度下降（SGD）及其变体、分布式数据并行与模型并行训练，以及高性能计算基础设施，以支撑数十亿甚至数万亿参数规模的模型训练。

在预训练之后，模型通常会使用带有任务特定标注的精心整理的数据集进行有监督微调（supervised fine-tuning），以提升其在下游应用中的性能。近年来，模型对齐技术（alignment techniques）逐渐成为核心环节，其中尤以基于人类反馈的强化学习（Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback，RLHF）为代表。该方法通过引入偏好模型（preference models）和策略优化算法（如近端策略优化，Proximal Policy Optimization，PPO），使模型输出更好地符合人类期望、安全约束和伦理规范。

在训练过程中，常采用包括 dropout、权重衰减（weight decay）和梯度裁剪（gradient clipping）在内的正则化方法，以稳定训练并防止过拟合。此外，课程学习（curriculum learning）、混合精度训练（mixed-precision training）以及自适应学习率调度器等高效优化策略，有助于加快收敛速度并提升模型的泛化能力。综合来看，这些方法共同构成了一个稳健且可扩展的训练框架，使大型语言模型能够获得广泛的语言能力、上下文推理能力以及在多样化任务中的适应性。
samples.prediction: 大型语言模型（Large Language Models，LLMs）的训练涉及一个多阶段流水线，该流水线集成了大规模数据处理、神经网络优化以及先进的学习范式。该过程通常从无监督或自监督的预训练开始，模型在海量文本语料上进行训练，利用诸如下一词预测（next-token prediction）或掩码语言建模（masked language modeling）等目标，通过 Transformer 架构学习语言的统计模式。这一阶段依赖于随机梯度下降（SGD）的变体、分布式数据并行和模型并行训练，以及高性能计算基础设施，以处理数十亿甚至数万亿参数。在预训练之后，模型通常会经历有监督微调，使用经过精心整理的任务特定数据集，以提升在下游应用中的性能。近年来，对齐技术（alignment techniques）如人类反馈强化学习（reinforcement learning from human feedback，RLHF）变得至关重要，其中采用偏好模型（preference models）和策略优化算法（如 Proximal Policy Optimization），以使模型输出与人类期望、安全约束和伦理准则保持一致。为稳定训练过程并防止过拟合，常用的正则化方法包括 dropout、权重衰减（weight decay）和梯度裁剪（gradient clipping）。此外，课程学习（curriculum learning）、混合精度训练（mixed-precision training）以及自适应学习率调度器等高效优化策略，有助于加快收敛速度并提升模型的泛化能力。

samples.instruction: 阅读下文，提炼其主要观点和方法。
samples.input:
quantum heat engines ( qhe ) have recently attracted great interest since it was originally proposed in @xcite . like their classical counterparts , these engines employ a quantum system as the working substance and run cyclically between two heat baths that are at thermal equilibrium at different temperatures @xmath0 and @xmath1 ( @xmath2 ) . 
 it absorbs @xmath3 heat from the hot bath at a temperature @xmath4 , performs certain mechanical work @xmath5 , and rejects heat @xmath6 to the bath at ...
samples.reference:
we demonstrate how a quantum otto engine ( qoe ) can be implemented using a single ion and an always - on thermal environment 
 . the internal degree of freedom of the ion is chosen as the working fluid , while the motional degree of freedom can be used as the cold bath . 
 we show , that by adiabatically changing the local magnetic field , the work efficiency can be asymptotically made unity . 
 we propose a projective measurement of the internal state of the ion that mimics the release of heat into the cold bath during the engine cycle . in our proposal , 
 the coupling to the hot and the cold baths need not be switched off and on in an alternative fashion during the engine cycle , unlike other existing proposals of qoe . 
 this renders the proposal experimentally feasible using the available tapped - ion engineering technology .

 we also show that the work efficiency of the engine is larger than that of the otto engine .

samples.instruction: Your ENTIRE response should be in en language, no other language is allowed. Your response should contain at least 100 words. In your response, the word "sustainability" should appear at least 3 times. Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<the importance of sustainability in modern business>>. At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.S.
samples.reference:
<<the importance of sustainability in modern business>>

sustainability has become a critical aspect in the world of modern business. companies that embrace sustainable practices not only contribute to environmental conservation but also enhance their reputation and financial performance. by integrating sustainability into their core operations, businesses can reduce waste, lower costs, and improve efficiency. moreover, consumers today are increasingly conscious of the environmental impact of the products they purchase, and they prefer to support companies that demonstrate a commitment to sustainability.

sustainability also plays a vital role in long-term strategic planning. businesses that prioritize sustainable practices are better equipped to adapt to regulatory changes, mitigate risks, and seize new opportunities. for instance, investing in renewable energy sources can help companies reduce their carbon footprint and become less reliant on volatile fossil fuel markets. additionally, sustainable practices can foster innovation and drive the development of new products and services that meet the evolving needs of consumers.

P.S. sustainability is not just a trend but a fundamental shift in how businesses operate. it is essential for companies to embrace sustainability to thrive in the future.
samples.prediction:
<<the importance of sustainability in modern business>>

sustainability has become a crucial aspect of modern business practices. companies are increasingly recognizing the importance of sustainability not only for environmental reasons but also for long-term economic viability. by adopting sustainable practices, businesses can reduce their environmental impact, improve efficiency, and enhance their reputation among consumers and stakeholders.

sustainability in business involves more than just reducing waste and conserving resources. it encompasses a holistic approach that considers the entire lifecycle of products and services. this includes sourcing materials responsibly, minimizing carbon emissions, and promoting social responsibility. by integrating sustainability into their core strategies, businesses can drive innovation and create new opportunities for growth.

furthermore, governments and regulatory bodies are also playing a significant role in promoting sustainability. through policies and regulations, they encourage businesses to adopt sustainable practices and set standards for environmental performance. this creates a more level playing field and ensures that all businesses contribute to a healthier planet.

in conclusion, sustainability is no longer an option but a necessity for modern businesses. by embracing sustainability, companies can achieve long-term success while contributing to a more sustainable future.

P.S. sustainability is a journey, not a destination. every step towards a more sustainable business is a step in the right direction.

samples.instruction: 请将以下内容翻译成英文，保持学术风格。
samples.input: 模型部署优化旨在在保证精度的前提下降低推理时延与资源消耗。常用方法包括模型压缩、结构化剪枝、低比特量化与知识蒸馏，以减少参数规模和内存带宽压力。在系统层面，结合算子融合、图编译与内核自动调优，利用ONNX、TensorRT等推理引擎实现硬件感知优化；同时通过批处理、流水并行与缓存复用提升吞吐。部署后需引入在线监控与A/B评测，持续校准性能—精度权衡。针对多模型服务场景，可采用异构加速与NUMA亲和性配置，结合容器化与弹性伸缩降低冷启动成本，并通过请求调度与负载均衡稳定SLA，与可观测性建设。
samples.reference: Model deployment optimization aims to reduce inference latency and resource consumption while preserving model accuracy. Common techniques include model compression, structured pruning, low-bit quantization, and knowledge distillation to reduce parameter size and alleviate memory bandwidth pressure. At the system level, operator fusion, graph compilation, and kernel auto-tuning are combined with inference engines such as ONNX and TensorRT to achieve hardware-aware optimization; meanwhile, batching, pipeline parallelism, and cache reuse are employed to improve throughput. After deployment, online monitoring and A/B testing should be introduced to continuously calibrate the performance–accuracy trade-off. For multi-model serving scenarios, heterogeneous acceleration and NUMA affinity configuration can be adopted, together with containerization and elastic scaling to reduce cold-start costs, and request scheduling and load balancing to stabilize SLA and enhance observability.
samples.prediction: Model deployment optimization aims to reduce inference latency and resource consumption while preserving accuracy. Common approaches include model compression, structured pruning, low-bit quantization, and knowledge distillation, to reduce parameter size and memory bandwidth pressure. At the system level, operator fusion, graph compilation, and kernel auto-tuning enable hardware-aware optimization using inference engines such as ONNX and TensorRT; meanwhile, batch processing, pipeline parallelism, and cache reuse improve throughput. Post-deployment, online monitoring and A/B testing are required to continuously calibrate the trade-off between performance and accuracy. For multi-model service scenarios, heterogeneous acceleration and NUMA affinity configurations can be employed together with containerization and elastic scaling to reduce cold start costs, while request scheduling and load balancing are used to stabilize SLAs in conjunction with observability practices.

samples.prediction: 代码生成是一种将规则、模板或模型自动转换为可执行代码的过程，常见于编程语言、框架和工具中。它通过定义结构、逻辑和样式，减少重复劳动，提升开发效率并降低人为错误。在实际应用中，代码生成可以用于接口设计、数据库模型、测试用例和部署脚本等场景，但也需要结合人工审查，确保质量和可维护性。随着AI技术的发展，代码生成能力不断提升，但仍面临可读性、安全性和一致性等挑战。

samples.instruction: Briefly summarize the following passage.
samples.input:
在深度学习模型规模不断扩大的背景下，模型在推理阶段的计算开销和部署成本成为实际应用中的关键瓶颈。知识蒸馏作为一种模型压缩与迁移技术，旨在将复杂高性能模型的知识迁移到结构更简单的模型中，在保证精度的同时降低参数量与延迟。

典型的知识蒸馏框架采用教师模型—学生模型范式。教师模型通常为预训练的大模型，学生模型通过最小化蒸馏损失进行学习。该损失函数一般由真实标签的监督损失与软目标的蒸馏损失共同组成，其中软目标来源于教师模型在较高温度系数下输出的概率分布，常用Kullback–Leibler散度进行度量，从而传递类别间的相对关系信息。除响应蒸馏外，特征蒸馏和关系蒸馏进一步对中间表示和样本关系进行约束，提升学生模型的表达能力。

从效果上看，知识蒸馏能够在模型压缩、跨架构迁移以及小样本学习场景中显著提升学生模型的泛化性能。近年来，在线蒸馏、自蒸馏等变体减少了对固定教师模型的依赖，增强了训练稳定性。总体而言，知识蒸馏为在资源受限环境中部署高性能模型提供了一种有效且灵活的解决方案。
samples.reference: 知识蒸馏通过教师—学生框架将大模型知识迁移至小模型，利用高温软目标与KL散度并结合监督损失，亦可蒸馏特征与关系。在模型压缩、迁移与小样本中提升泛化，在线/自蒸馏降低依赖，适合资源受限部署。
samples.prediction: 知识蒸馏通过教师学生范式将大模型知识迁移至小模型，降低参数量与延迟。其损失结合监督与软目标，支持特征、关系及在线自蒸馏，可在压缩、迁移与小样本场景下显著提升泛化性能。

samples.instruction:
Your ENTIRE response should be in en language, no other language is allowed. Your response should contain at least 150 words. Include keywords [ocean, whales, ecosystem, protection]. In your response, the word "whales" should appear at least 3 times. Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<poem of joy>>. Finish your response with this exact phrase [Is there anything else I can help with?].

Discuss the importance of protecting the ocean and its inhabitants, focusing on whales.
samples.reference:
<<The Importance of Ocean and Whale Protection>>

the vast and mysterious ocean covers more than 70 percent of our planet serving as a critical life support system for all living beings the health of the ocean directly impacts the well being of our entire planet including humans the ocean is home to an incredible diversity of marine life including majestic whales these gentle giants play a vital role in maintaining the balance of the marine ecosystem

whales are apex predators and their presence helps regulate the populations of other marine species this in turn maintains the health and stability of the entire ecosystem for example baleen whales feed on tiny shrimp like organisms called krill by consuming large quantities of krill they prevent overgrazing of phytoplankton which are responsible for producing half of the world's oxygen through photosynthesis

beyond their ecological importance whales also have significant cultural and economic value to human societies many communities around the world rely on whale watching tourism as a source of income and employment which can be more sustainable than hunting or other extractive industries however whale populations are facing numerous threats including pollution ship strikes entanglement in fishing gear and climate change

protecting the ocean and its inhabitants particularly whales is crucial for the health of our planet and future generations governments ngos and individuals must work together to implement and enforce policies that safeguard marine ecosystems and the species that call them home this includes establishing marine protected areas reducing pollution and addressing climate change

whales are not only fascinating creatures but they are also essential for the health of the ocean and the survival of many species including humans we must take action to protect them and the ocean they call home Is there anything else I can help with?
samples.prediction:
<<The Importance of Protecting the Ocean and Its Whales>>

the ocean is a vast and mysterious realm that plays a crucial role in our planet's ecosystem. it is home to countless species of marine life, including the majestic whales, which are not only fascinating creatures but also vital to the health of the ocean. protecting the ocean and its inhabitants, especially whales, is essential for maintaining the balance of the marine ecosystem.

whales are among the largest and most intelligent animals on earth. they play a significant role in the ocean's food chain, helping to regulate the populations of various species. for example, the presence of whales can influence the distribution and behavior of smaller fish and other marine animals. by protecting whales, we ensure the health and stability of the entire ecosystem.

furthermore, whales are indicators of the health of the ocean. their populations can provide valuable insights into the state of the marine environment. changes in whale populations can signal shifts in water quality, temperature, and other environmental factors. by monitoring whale populations, scientists can better understand the impacts of human activities on the ocean and develop effective conservation strategies.

the protection of whales also has economic and cultural significance. many communities around the world rely on whale watching as a source of income and a way to connect with their cultural heritage. by protecting these magnificent creatures, we not only preserve their habitats but also support the livelihoods of those who depend on them.

in conclusion, protecting the ocean and its inhabitants, particularly whales, is crucial for the health and sustainability of our planet. through conservation efforts, we can ensure that future generations can enjoy the beauty and wonder of the ocean and its incredible inhabitants.

is there anything else i can help with?

accreting x - ray pulsars are highly magnetized neutron stars in a binary system , accreting matter from their companion star . the mass transfer can take place via roche - lobe overflow , strong stellar winds for giant stars or the be emission mechanism . 
 these accreting pulsars radiate predominantly in the x - ray band , and the radiation is modulated by the stellar rotation of the pulsar . for a review on this subject , see e.g. , nagase  @xcite . 
 gx  1 + 4 is an accreting x - ray pulsar ...

we report on the long - term evolution of the spin period of the symbiotic x - ray pulsar gx  1 + 4 and a possible interpretation within a model of quasi - spherical accretion . 
 new period measurements from bepposax , integral and fermi observations have been combined with previously published data from four decades of observations . during 
 the 1970 s gx  1 + 4 was spinning up with the fastest rate among the known x - ray pulsars at the time . in the mid 1980 s it underwent a change during a period of low x - ray flux and started to spin down with a rate similar in magnitude to the previous spin up rate . 
 the spin period has changed from @xmath0110  s to @xmath0160  s within the last three decades . 
 our results demonstrate that the overall spin down trend continues and is stronger than ever . 
 we compare the observations with predictions from a model assuming quasi - spherical accretion from the slow wind of the m giant companion .

samples.instruction: 用简洁的语言概括下文的主要观点。
samples.input:
上下文学习（In-Context Learning, ICL）是近年来大规模语言模型中涌现的重要能力。其背景源于预训练—微调范式的成本与泛化瓶颈：传统方法依赖任务特定数据与参数更新，难以快速适配新任务。ICL通过在推理阶段仅提供少量示例或指令，使模型在不更新参数的情况下完成新任务，显著降低了部署与迁移成本。

从方法上看，ICL主要依托Transformer的自注意力机制与大规模预训练语料。模型在上下文中将示例视为隐式条件，学习输入到输出的映射关系，表现为模式匹配、隐式梯度下降或贝叶斯更新等解释框架。提示工程（Prompt Engineering）成为关键技术手段，包括示例选择、顺序排列、模板设计以及链式思维（Chain-of-Thought）等，以增强模型对任务结构的捕获能力。

在效果与结论方面，ICL已在分类、信息抽取、代码生成和推理任务中取得接近甚至超过微调模型的性能，体现出良好的零样本与小样本泛化能力。然而，其效果对上下文分布高度敏感，存在长度受限、稳定性不足和可解释性较弱等问题。未来研究将聚焦于理论建模、自动化提示优化以及与参数高效微调方法的融合，以进一步释放上下文学习的潜...
samples.reference: 上下文学习使大模型在不更新参数的情况下，仅凭少量示例完成新任务，降低迁移成本。其依托Transformer注意力与预训练，通过提示工程建模任务结构，在多任务上表现接近微调，但受上下文敏感、长度与稳定性限制，未来需加强理论与自动化优化。
samples.prediction: 上下文学习通过在推理阶段仅提供少量示例，使模型在无需参数更新下完成新任务，依托Transformer自注意力与大规模预训练，结合提示工程提升性能，但受上下文分布影响，仍需理论与技术进一步优化。

samples.instruction: Translate the following CS paper abstract into Chinese.
samples.input: Image generation models aim to learn a high-dimensional mapping from a latent representation or noise distribution to the space of natural images, capturing complex visual semantics, textures, and spatial dependencies. Early approaches such as Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) formalized this task via probabilistic latent variable models, optimizing an evidence lower bound (ELBO) to balance reconstruction fidelity and latent regularization, albeit often at the cost of blurry outputs due to Gaussia...
samples.reference: 图像生成模型旨在学习从潜在表示或噪声分布到自然图像空间的高维映射，从而捕捉复杂的视觉语义、纹理以及空间依赖关系。早期方法如变分自编码器（Variational Autoencoders，VAEs）通过概率潜变量模型对这一任务进行形式化，采用证据下界（Evidence Lower Bound，ELBO）进行优化，在重建保真度与潜空间正则化之间取得平衡，但由于高斯分布假设的限制，往往导致生成结果模糊。随后，生成对抗网络（Generative Adversarial Networks，GANs）将图像合成重新表述为生成器与判别器之间的极小极大博弈，能够生成清晰且逼真的样本，但也面临训练不稳定、模式崩塌以及对超参数高度敏感等问题。近年来，基于扩散的模型逐渐成为主流范式，其通过学习从已知噪声过程出发的逐步去噪过程，有效地以一系列条件转移近似数据分布。这类模型在样本多样性、训练稳定性以及基于似然的理论基础方面表现优越，尤其是在潜空间中实现时，可显著提升计算效率。条件化机制（如 classifier-free guidance、cross-attention 以及多模态编码器）使得模型能够根据文本、布局或其他模态实现可控生成。Transformer 架构通过建模长程依赖关系，进一步提升了模型的可扩展性和全局一致性。模型评估通常依赖于 Fréchet Inception Distance（FID）、Inception Score（IS）以及人类感知评测等指标，但如何使这些指标与主观视觉质量更好地对齐，仍然是一个有待解决的研究挑战。
samples.prediction: 图像生成模型旨在学习从潜在表示或噪声分布到自然图像空间的高维映射，以捕获复杂的视觉语义、纹理和空间依赖关系。早期方法如变分自编码器（Variational Autoencoders，VAEs）通过概率潜变量模型对这一任务进行了形式化，通过优化证据下界（Evidence Lower Bound，ELBO）在重建保真度与潜空间正则化之间取得平衡，尽管这通常会以高斯假设带来模糊输出。生成式对抗网络（Generative Adversarial Networks，GANs）随后将图像合成重新定义为生成器与判别器之间的极小极大博弈，能够产生清晰且真实的样本，但同时也面临训练不稳定、模式崩塌以及对超参数敏感的问题。近年来，基于扩散的模型（diffusion-based models）已成为主流范式，通过学习从已知噪声过程中对样本进行迭代去噪，有效地通过一系列条件转换来逼近数据分布。这类模型在样本多样性、训练动态稳定性以及基于似然的强基础方面表现出优越性，尤其是在将其实现为潜空间中时，可以显著提升计算效率。条件机制（conditioning mechanisms），如分类器自指示（classifier-free guidance）、交叉注意（cross-attention）以及多模态编码器（multimodal encoders），使得从文本、布局或其他模态中实现可控生成成为可能。Transformer 架构通过建模长程依赖关系进一步增强了模型的可扩展性

 the motivation of the present work is to look for a similar effect in the inverse process , namely atomic recombination in ultrastrong fields . 
 the main diff...

the dynamics of the recombination in ultrastrong atomic fields is studied for one - dimensional models by numerical simulations . 
 a nonmonotonic behavior of the bound state final population as a function of the laser field amplitude is examined . 
 an important role of a slow drift of an electron wave packet is observed .

 we have also shown that the recombination rate is a decreasing function of the initial momentum of the incoming electron . 
 we have also shown that the recombination probability is a decreasing function of the initial momentum of the incoming electron .

samples.instruction: 将以下中文技术文档翻译成英文。
samples.input: 零样本学习（Zero-Shot Learning, ZSL）是一类旨在解决模型在训练阶段未见过类别样本情况下进行有效识别与推断的问题。其核心思想是通过引入语义空间或辅助信息（如属性向量、语义嵌入、知识图谱或文本描述），建立已见类别与未见类别之间的语义关联，从而实现跨类别的知识迁移。典型方法包括基于属性的映射模型、联合嵌入模型以及生成式模型，其中后者常借助变分自编码器（VAE）或生成对抗网络（GAN）合成未见类别特征以缓解分布偏移问题。零样本学习在计算机视觉、自然语言处理和跨模态检索等领域具有重要应用价值，但仍面临语义鸿沟、域偏移及泛化能力不足等挑战。
samples.reference: Zero-Shot Learning (ZSL) is a class of methods aimed at addressing the problem of effective recognition and inference when models encounter categories that were not seen during the training phase. The core idea is to introduce a semantic space or auxiliary information—such as attribute vectors, semantic embeddings, knowledge graphs, or textual descriptions—to establish semantic relationships between seen and unseen categories, thereby enabling cross-category knowledge transfer. Typical approaches include attribute-based mapping models, joint embedding models, and generative models, the latter of which often leverage Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) or Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to synthesize features of unseen categories in order to alleviate distribution shift issues. Zero-shot learning has significant application value in fields such as computer vision, natural language processing, and cross-modal retrieval, but it still faces challenges including the semantic gap, domain shift, and limited generalization capability.
samples.prediction: Zero-Shot Learning (ZSL) is a class of approaches aimed at addressing the problem of effective recognition and inference when models are trained without any samples from categories that have not been seen during training. The core idea is to establish semantic relationships between seen and unseen categories by introducing semantic spaces or auxiliary information (such as attribute vectors, semantic embeddings, knowledge graphs, or textual descriptions), thereby enabling cross-category knowledge transfer. Typical methods include attribute-based mapping models, joint embedding models, and generative models. Among these, the latter often leverage Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) or Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to synthesize features for unseen categories in order to mitigate distribution shift issues. Zero-Shot Learning has significant application value in fields such as computer vision, natural language processing, and cross-modal retrieval, but it still faces challenges including semantic gaps, domain shift, and insufficient generalization capability.

samples.instruction: I need help with a presentation on the economic impact of renewable energy. Can you provide a brief overview of the key points I should cover? Your response should contain at least 4 bullet points. Use the markdown bullet points such as: * This is point 1.
samples.reference:
* *Economic Growth*: Discuss how the renewable energy sector contributes to economic growth through job creation in manufacturing, installation, and maintenance of renewable energy systems.
* *Energy Independence*: Highlight the role of renewable energy in reducing dependency on imported fuels, which can stabilize energy prices and enhance national security.
* *Environmental Benefits*: Explain how transitioning to renewable energy can lead to significant reductions in greenhouse gas emissions and other pollutants, contributing to better public health and environmental quality.
* *Technological Innovation*: Emphasize the drive for technological advancements in renewable energy, which can lead to new industries and economic opportunities, as well as improvements in energy efficiency.
samples.prediction:
* *Introduction to Renewable Energy*: Define renewable energy and its importance in the global energy mix. Highlight the role of renewable sources like solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal in reducing dependency on fossil fuels.
* *Economic Benefits*: Discuss the economic advantages of renewable energy, including job creation in manufacturing, installation, and maintenance sectors, as well as potential savings on energy costs over time.
* *Environmental Impact*: Explain how renewable energy contributes to environmental sustainability by reducing greenhouse gas emissions, improving air quality, and preserving natural resources.
* *Challenges and Solutions*: Address the challenges faced by the renewable energy industry, such as intermittency and infrastructure needs, and explore solutions like energy storage technologies and grid modernization.

samples.instruction: 用简洁的语言概括下文的主要观点。
samples.input: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) has emerged as a critical technique to address the growing computational and storage challenges associated with adapting large pre-trained models, particularly large language models (LLMs), to downstream tasks. As model sizes scale to billions or trillions of parameters, conventional full-parameter fine-tuning becomes increasingly impractical due to high memory consumption, long training times, and the need to maintain separate copies of models for each tas...
samples.reference: PEFT通过冻结大模型主体，仅引入少量可训练参数实现高效微调。典型方法包括Adapter、LoRA、Prefix/Prompt Tuning等，在保持接近全量微调性能的同时，将训练参数降至1%以下，显著降低算力、存储与部署成本，并支持多任务与持续学习。
samples.prediction: 参数高效微调（PEFT）通过冻结大模型主体并引入少量可训练参数，实现高效适配。代表方法包括Adapter、LoRA、Prefix/Prompt Tuning等，可显著降低参数量、提升训练效率与模型可扩展性。

samples.instruction:
What are the benefits of using solar energy?

Your ENTIRE response should be in en language, no other language is allowed.
Your response should contain less than 120 words.
Your response must contain at least 3 placeholders represented by square brackets, such as [address].
Highlight at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*.
At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.S.

What are the benefits of using solar energy? *Solar energy is a renewable and sustainable resource* that helps reduce carbon emissions. It can be harnessed almost anywhere there is sunlight, making it a versatile energy source. Solar panels, once installed, have *minimal operating costs and require little maintenance*. Additionally, using solar energy can lead to significant savings on electricity bills over time. Solar installations can also increase the value of [property] and provide energy independence by reducing reliance on [utility company]. P.S. Consider checking with local authorities for any [incentives] or rebates available in your area.

samples.instruction: Summarize the key points of the following technical content.
samples.input:
在机器学习建模过程中，过拟合与欠拟合是影响模型泛化能力的核心问题。欠拟合通常源于模型容量不足或特征表达能力有限，导致模型无法捕捉数据中的真实模式，在训练集和测试集上均表现较差。相反，过拟合则是模型对训练数据中的噪声和偶然性进行过度学习，虽然训练误差很低，但在未见数据上的泛化误差显著增大。这两种现象本质上反映了偏差—方差权衡失衡。

针对欠拟合问题，常见方法包括提升模型复杂度、引入非线性特征、改进特征工程或更换表达能力更强的模型结构，例如从线性模型过渡到核方法或深度神经网络。而缓解过拟合则需要抑制模型的有效自由度，常用技术包括正则化（如L1、L2正则）、Dropout、Early Stopping 以及基于交叉验证的模型选择。此外，通过数据增强、增加训练样本规模，也可以从数据分布层面降低方差风险。

从理论角度看，VC维和结构风险最小化为理解模型复杂度与泛化误差提供了分析框架；在实践中，偏差与方差的平衡往往依赖经验与验证集评估结果。综合来看，合理控制模型复杂度、结合数据规模与任务特性，是避免过拟合与欠拟合、提升模型稳定性和泛化性能的关键结论。
samples.reference: 过拟合与欠拟合源于偏差—方差失衡。欠拟合因模型容量不足，可通过提升复杂度与特征表达缓解；过拟合因自由度过高，可借助正则化、Dropout、Early Stopping、数据增强等抑制。合理控制模型复杂度并结合验证评估是提升泛化性能的关键。
samples.prediction: 过拟合与欠拟合源于偏差—方差权衡失衡。欠拟合因模型容量不足，过拟合因模型过度学习噪声。缓解欠拟合可提升模型复杂度与特征工程；缓解过拟合需正则化、Dropout、Early Stopping、数据增强及验证集评估。

samples.instruction: 写一段关于强化学习的文字，必须包含以下关键词：训练, 参数, 损失函数。
samples.reference: 强化学习是一种通过与环境交互来学习最优策略的方法，在训练过程中，智能体根据获得的奖励不断调整自身的参数，以提升决策效果，通常会借助损失函数来衡量当前策略与理想目标之间的差距，并通过最小化损失函数来引导模型逐步收敛，从而实现性能的持续改进。
samples.prediction: 强化学习是一种通过与环境交互来学习策略的方法，其核心在于模型不断根据当前状态和动作选择的奖励值进行更新，而这些更新通常通过调整模型的参数来实现，而这些参数的优化过程会在训练中不断减小损失函数的值，从而使模型逐步学习到更优的决策策略。

samples.instruction: Summarize the key points of the following technical content.
samples.input:
在深度学习模型落地过程中，大模型通常具备更高的表示能力和泛化性能，但其参数规模和计算开销限制了在边缘设备或实时场景中的应用。知识蒸馏方法正是在这一背景下提出，其核心目标是将复杂教师模型中蕴含的“暗知识”迁移到轻量级学生模型，从而在保持性能的同时显著降低推理成本。

经典的知识蒸馏采用教师—学生框架，通过软标签进行监督学习。教师模型输出的logits经过温度参数平滑后形成软目标，学生模型通过最小化与教师输出之间的KL散度来学习类别间的相对关系信息。相比仅使用硬标签训练，软目标能够提供更丰富的类别相似性约束，有助于缓解过拟合并提升小模型的表达能力。随着研究深入，蒸馏方法从响应层蒸馏扩展到特征蒸馏和关系蒸馏，例如对中间特征图、注意力分布或样本间相似度进行对齐。

在训练范式上，知识蒸馏也从离线蒸馏发展到在线蒸馏和自蒸馏。在线蒸馏通过多个学生模型协同学习，避免对预训练教师的依赖；自蒸馏则利用模型不同层级或不同训练阶段作为教师信号，进一步挖掘模型自身的潜在知识。实验表明，合理设计蒸馏目标和权重，可以在图像分类、目标检测和自然语言处理等任务中，使学生模型在参数量大幅减少的情况下接近甚至超过教师模型...
samples.reference: 知识蒸馏通过教师—学生框架将大模型暗知识迁移至小模型，以软标签、特征或关系对齐为核心，降低推理成本。其范式已从离线扩展到在线与自蒸馏，在多任务中实现参数大幅压缩下的高性能。
samples.prediction: 知识蒸馏通过将教师模型的暗知识迁移至轻量学生模型，在保持性能的同时显著降低推理成本。其核心方法包括软标签、特征蒸馏、关系蒸馏等，并发展为在线和自蒸馏，已在多种任务中表现出高效的模型压缩与推理能力。

samples.instruction: 中文翻译：
samples.input: Training large language models (LLMs) typically follows a multi-stage pipeline centered on self-supervised learning over massive text corpora using transformer architectures. In the pretraining phase, models are optimized to maximize the likelihood of token sequences under objectives such as autoregressive next-token prediction or masked language modeling, commonly implemented via cross-entropy loss. Text is first normalized and tokenized using subword schemes like byte-pair encoding or unigram ...
samples.reference: 大型语言模型（LLM）的训练通常遵循一个以自监督学习为核心的多阶段流水线，在基于 Transformer 架构的海量文本语料上进行。在预训练阶段，模型通过自回归的下一词预测或掩码语言建模等目标函数进行优化，通常采用交叉熵损失来最大化词元序列的似然。文本首先经过规范化处理，并使用字节对编码（byte-pair encoding，BPE）或 unigram 语言模型等子词分词方案进行分词，以在词表规模与表达能力之间取得平衡。优化过程通常采用随机梯度下降的变体，如 Adam 或 AdamW，并结合学习率预热、余弦衰减调度、梯度裁剪，以及包括 dropout 和权重衰减在内的正则化技术。由于参数规模和数据规模巨大，训练依赖分布式系统，通过数据并行、张量/模型并行、流水线并行、混合精度计算以及梯度检查点等技术来管理内存开销和通信成本。经验尺度定律（empirical scaling laws）为模型规模、数据集规模和计算预算的选择提供指导，以实现可预测的性能提升。完成预训练后，模型通常还会经过微调阶段，以提升任务对齐性和可用性，包括有监督的指令微调以及基于偏好的优化方法，如人类反馈强化学习（reinforcement learning from human feedback，RLHF）或直接偏好优化（direct preference optimization）。这些阶段在保留大规模预训练所获得的通用语言知识的同时，使预训练表示能够更好地遵循自然语言指令、符合安全约束，并生成更加连贯、有用且可控的输出。
samples.prediction:
大型语言模型（Large Language Models，LLMs）的训练通常遵循一个多阶段流水线，其核心是在海量文本语料上进行自监督学习，采用 Transformer 架构。在预训练阶段，模型会根据自回归下一词预测（autoregressive next-token prediction）或掩码语言建模（masked language modeling）等目标进行优化，这些目标通常通过交叉熵损失（cross-entropy loss）实现。文本首先会进行归一化和分词，采用字节对编码（byte-pair encoding，BPE）或 unigram 语言模型等子词级分词方案，以在词表规模和表达能力之间取得平衡。优化过程中，常用于梯度下降的变体，如 Adam 或 AdamW，并结合学习率预热（warmup）、余弦衰减（cosine decay）计划、梯度裁剪（gradient clipping），以及包括 dropout 和权重衰减（weight decay）在内的正则化技术。

由于模型参数规模和数据规模都非常庞大，训练过程依赖于分布式系统，这些系统通常采用数据并行（data parallelism）、张量并行（tensor parallelism）、流水并行（pipeline parallelism）以及混合精度计算（mixed-precision arithmetic），以有效管理内存开销和通信开销。经验性的尺度定律（scaling laws）则指导了模型规模、数据集规模以及计算预算的选择，以实现可预测的性能提升。在预训练之后，模型通常会通过有监督指令微调（supervised instruction tuning）和基于偏好的优化方法（如基于人类反馈的强化学习，

samples.instruction: 写一段关于提示工程的文字，字数要求在150到300之间。
samples.reference: 提示工程是指通过精心设计和优化提示语，引导大语言模型产生更准确、有用输出的技术。它强调对任务目标、上下文信息、约束条件和示例的清晰表达，帮助模型理解用户真实意图。良好的提示工程可以显著提升模型性能，减少歧义和错误，在内容创作、代码生成、数据分析等场景中具有重要价值。随着模型能力提升，提示工程也逐渐成为人机协作中的关键技能。
samples.prediction: 提示工程是指在与大模型或生成式AI交互时，通过精心设计和优化提示内容，使其更准确、高效地产生预期结果的一种方法。它强调理解模型的能力、结构以及可能的误解范围，合理组织信息、设定上下文、明确要求和约束条件。通过反复测试、迭代和校验，可以显著提升输出质量，减少歧义，同时降低偏差和错误率，从而在实际应用中更好地利用AI技术。

samples.instruction: 介绍神经网络，但不要使用'极其'这个词。
samples.reference:
神经网络是一类受生物神经系统启发的机器学习模型，旨在让计算机从数据中自动学习规律。它由多个“神经元”组成，这些神经元按层次结构连接，常见包括输入层、若干隐藏层和输出层。每个神经元会对输入进行加权求和，并通过激活函数产生输出，从而实现对复杂关系的表达。

在训练过程中，神经网络通过损失函数衡量预测结果与真实结果的差距，并利用反向传播算法不断调整权重，使模型性能逐步提升。由于具备强大的非线性建模能力，神经网络被广泛应用于图像识别、语音处理、自然语言理解、推荐系统等领域，是现代人工智能的重要基础之一。
samples.prediction: 神经网络是一种模仿人脑结构的计算模型，由多层神经元组成。每一层神经元接收输入，经过非线性变换后传递给下一层。通过大量数据训练，网络可以学习特征和规律，从而完成分类、回归、识别等任务。随着算法和硬件的发展，神经网络在图像识别、语音处理、自然语言处理等领域取得了显著成果。

samples.reference:
we present an analytic derivation of the temporal dependence of the perpendicular transport coefficient of charged particles in magnetostatic turbulence , for times smaller than the time needed to charged particles to travel the turbulence correlation length . 
 this time window is left unexplored in most transport models . in our analysis 
 all magnetic scales are taken to be much larger than the particle gyroradius , so that perpendicular transport is assumed to be dominated by the guiding center motion . 
 particle drift from the local magnetic field lines and magnetic field lines random walk are evaluated separately for slab and 3d isotropic turbulence . 
 contributions of wavelength scales shorter and longer than the turbulence coherence length are compared . 
 in contrast to slab case , particles in 3d isotropic turbulence unexpectedly diffuse from local magnetic field lines ; this result questions the common assumption that particle magnetization is independent on turbulence geometry . extensions of this model will allow for a study of solar wind anisotropies .

6. **跨学科融合**：结合语言学、计算机科学与人工智能相关方法。

samples.instruction: 请将以下英文内容译为中文，保持专业术语准确。
samples.input: Gradient clipping is a stabilization technique commonly employed in training deep neural networks to mitigate the problem of exploding gradients, particularly in recurrent neural networks and very deep architectures. During backpropagation, gradients can grow exponentially due to repeated multiplication by large Jacobian matrices, leading to numerical instability and divergence of optimization. Gradient clipping addresses this by enforcing an upper bound on gradient magnitude before parameter up...
samples.reference:
梯度裁剪（Gradient clipping）是一种在训练深度神经网络时常用的稳定化技术，旨在缓解梯度爆炸问题，尤其适用于循环神经网络（Recurrent Neural Networks）和非常深的网络结构。在反向传播过程中，由于梯度反复与较大的雅可比矩阵相乘，其数值可能呈指数级增长，从而导致数值不稳定以及优化过程发散。梯度裁剪通过在参数更新之前对梯度幅值施加上界来解决这一问题。

最常用的方法是基于范数的裁剪（norm-based clipping）：当梯度的全局 ℓ2 范数超过预设阈值时，对梯度进行等比例缩放，在限制其尺度的同时保持其方向不变。另一种方法是基于数值的裁剪（value-based clipping），即将每个梯度分量限制在固定区间内，但这种方式可能会扭曲梯度方向，从而对收敛性产生不利影响。

在现代实践中，更常采用跨所有参数的全局范数裁剪（global norm clipping），因为它能够保持不同层之间的相对尺度关系，并且能够很好地与随机梯度下降（Stochastic Gradient Descent, SGD）以及 Adam、RMSProp 等自适应优化器相结合。从理论角度看，梯度裁剪可以被解释为对优化轨迹的 Lipschitz 连续性施加一种软约束，从而在不改变底层损失函数的前提下提升训练稳定性。

然而，阈值选择不当可能引入偏置、减缓收敛速度，甚至掩盖优化过程中的潜在问题。因此，在大规模神经网络模型的训练中，梯度裁剪通常需要与精心调节的学习率以及各种归一化技术相结合，以实现稳健而高效的训练动态。

samples.instruction: 请写5段关于提示工程的内容，每段以数字编号开头。
samples.reference:
1. 提示工程是指通过精心设计输入提示，引导大语言模型产生更准确、有用和可控输出的一门实践，它强调人机交互中语言表达的重要性。  
2. 提示工程的核心原则包括明确目标、提供足够上下文、设定角色和约束条件，从而减少模型歧义并提高响应一致性。  
3. 常见的提示工程技巧有示例驱动（Few-shot）、逐步推理（Chain-of-Thought）、结构化输出要求以及反向提示等，用于应对不同复杂度的任务。  
4. 提示工程是一个持续迭代的过程，需要通过测试、评估和调整提示来优化效果，并根据模型更新和任务变化不断改进。  
5. 在实际应用中，提示工程还需要关注伦理与安全问题，避免引导模型生成有害内容，同时结合自动化工具提升提示设计的效率与可复用性。
samples.prediction:
1. 提示工程是指在与大模型或生成式AI交互时，通过精心设计和优化提示语来获得更准确、更有用的输出的一种方法。它强调理解AI的能力范围，合理设置上下文、目标和约束条件。

2. 在实践中，提示工程通常包括明确任务、提供示例、设定格式以及限定输出长度等步骤。这些细节有助于AI减少歧义，提升结果的可控性和可读性。

3. 提示工程还涉及对不同类型任务的适配，例如编写文档、生成代码、回答问题和设计方案。不同场景可能需要不同的提示结构，以突出重点信息并引导AI行为。

4. 从技术角度看，提示工程还需要关注对话风格、上下文维护和迭代式改进的要求。通过持续调整提示，可以逐步提高系统在复杂任务中的表现。

5. 最后，提示工程不仅关注结果本身，还关注开发者与用户之间的沟通与协作。合理的提示可以减少误解，提升团队对AI工具的理解与应用能力。

samples.instruction: 概括下文的主要内容和贡献。
samples.input: Hallucination refers to the tendency of large language models (LLMs) and other generative systems to produce outputs that are fluent and syntactically correct but factually incorrect, logically inconsistent, or unsupported by the underlying data. This phenomenon arises from the probabilistic nature of autoregressive generation, where models optimize for likelihood rather than truthfulness. As LLMs are increasingly deployed in high-stakes domains such as healthcare, law, scientific research, and ...

samples.instruction: 中文翻译：
samples.input: GPU parallel computing leverages the massive concurrency and high memory bandwidth of modern graphics processing units to accelerate data-parallel workloads that are computationally intensive and throughput-oriented. Unlike traditional CPUs optimized for low-latency serial execution, GPUs adopt a Single Instruction, Multiple Threads (SIMT) execution model, in which thousands of lightweight threads are organized into warps and executed concurrently on streaming multiprocessors. Programming framew...
samples.reference:
GPU 并行计算利用现代图形处理器所具备的大规模并发能力和高内存带宽，加速计算密集型、以吞吐量为导向的数据并行工作负载。不同于针对低延迟串行执行进行优化的传统 CPU，GPU 采用单指令多线程（Single Instruction, Multiple Threads，SIMT）执行模型，将成千上万个轻量级线程组织成 warp，并在流式多处理器（streaming multiprocessors）上并发执行。CUDA、OpenCL 等编程框架通过 kernel、线程块以及分层内存空间将这一体系结构暴露给程序员，从而实现对并行执行的细粒度控制。

GPU 上的性能优化高度依赖于对内存层次结构的深入理解，包括全局内存（global memory）、共享内存（shared memory）、寄存器（registers）和缓存（caches），同时还需要通过合并访问（coalesced access）和高效使用共享内存来最小化内存访问延迟。通过调度大量常驻 warp，可以实现高占用率（occupancy）和延迟隐藏（latency hiding），使得在部分 warp 因内存操作而阻塞时，其他 warp 仍能继续执行计算。此外，指令级并行性（instruction-level parallelism）、寄存器压力（register pressure）以及同步开销（synchronization overhead）等因素也会显著影响 kernel 的执行效率。诸如 roofline model 之类的分析模型，常用于分析算术强度与内存带宽之间的平衡关系。

总体而言，只要算法能够针对底层硬件特性进行精心设计，GPU 并行计算便能在科学计算、机器学习和数据分析等应用领域带来显著的性能提升和能效优势。
samples.prediction: GPU 并行计算利用现代图形处理单元的巨大并发能力和高内存带宽，加速计算密集型且通过量化（throughput）导向的数据并行工作负载。与针对低延迟串行执行而优化的传统 CPU 不同，GPU 采用单指令多线程（Single Instruction, Multiple Threads，SIMT）执行模型，其中成千上万个轻量级线程被组织成 warp 并在流式多处理器上并行执行。CUDA 和 OpenCL 等编程框架通过内核（kernel）、线程块（thread block）和层次化的内存空间，暴露了这一底层架构，使得开发者能够对并行执行实现精细化控制。在 GPU 上的性能优化，关键在于理解内存层次结构，包括全局内存、共享内存、寄存器以及缓存，同时通过合并访问（coalesced access）和有效利用共享内存，最小化内存延迟。高容量（high occupancy）和延迟隐藏依赖于对大量 resident warp 的调度，使得在其他 warp 在内存操作上挂起时，计算仍能持续进行。此外，指令级并行性、寄存器压力以及同步开销等因素，也会显著影响 kernel 的效率。roofline 模型等分析模型通常被用于理解算术强度与内存带宽之间的平衡关系。总体而言，GPU 并行计算在科学计算、机器学习和数据分析等应用中，只要算法能够精心设计，以匹配底层硬件特性，就能够获得显著的性能和能效提升。

samples.instruction: Translate the following CS paper abstract into Chinese.
samples.input: Model monitoring and maintenance are critical components of the machine learning lifecycle, ensuring that deployed models continue to perform reliably under evolving real-world conditions. Effective monitoring involves continuous tracking of both model performance metrics (e.g., accuracy, precision, recall, latency) and data-related signals such as data drift, concept drift, and feature distribution shifts. Statistical tests, distributional distance measures, and real-time alerting mechanisms ar...
samples.reference:
模型监控与维护是机器学习生命周期中的关键组成部分，旨在确保已部署模型在不断变化的真实世界环境下持续稳定、可靠地运行。有效的监控需要持续跟踪模型性能指标（如 accuracy、precision、recall、latency 等），以及与数据相关的信号，包括数据漂移（data drift）、概念漂移（concept drift）和特征分布变化。通常会采用统计检验、分布距离度量以及实时告警机制，来检测训练数据与生产环境数据之间的偏差。除性能退化之外，监控还涵盖运维层面的因素，包括系统可用性、资源利用率以及推理吞吐量。

模型维护是在监控结果基础上的进一步工作，通常包括定期重训练、重新校准或模型替换，以应对已识别的问题。该过程往往依赖于健壮的数据流水线、模型与数据集的版本控制，以及可复现的训练工作流，以确保可追溯性和合规性。此外，诸如可解释性、公平性和监管合规性等治理层面的考量，也需要在模型整个生命周期中持续审视。通过将自动化监控工具与清晰明确的维护策略相结合，组织能够降低模型风险，提升系统鲁棒性，并持续从机器学习部署中获得长期的业务价值。
samples.prediction: 模型监控与维护是机器学习生命周期中的关键组成部分，其目标是确保已部署模型在不断变化的真实世界条件下持续保持可靠性。有效的监控需要同时跟踪模型性能指标（如准确率、精确率、召回率、延迟）以及与数据相关的信号，例如数据漂移、概念漂移以及特征分布的偏移。为了检测训练数据与生产数据之间的偏离，通常会采用统计检验、分布距离度量以及实时警报机制。除性能退化外，监控还涵盖了运行方面的方面，包括系统可用性、资源利用率以及推理吞吐量。模型维护基于监控洞见，通常包括周期性的模型重训练、重新校准或模型替换，以应对已检测到的问题。这一过程往往需要稳健的数据流水线、模型和数据集的版本控制，以及可复现的训练工作流，以确保可追溯性和合规性。此外，模型生命周期中还需要不断审视可解释性、公平性以及监管合规性等治理问题。通过将自动化监控工具与具有明确维护策略的流程相结合，组织可以降低模型风险，提升系统韧性，并持续获得机器学习部署带来的长期业务价值。

L'amour, dans toutes ses formes, est un moteur puissant qui nous pousse à devenir de meilleures versions de nous-mêmes, à nous ouvrir aux autres, et à vivre des expériences qui donnent un sens à notre existence.

While this pre-training enables strong generalization, the resulting models often underperform on specialized tasks due to domain shift, task-specific constraints, or differences...

samples.instruction: 写一篇关于强化学习的短文，必须以问句结尾。
samples.reference: 强化学习是一种通过与环境交互来学习最优策略的机器学习方法，智能体在不断试错中根据奖励信号调整行为。它的核心在于状态、动作、奖励和策略的循环，使系统能够在不确定环境中逐步提升决策质量。强化学习已广泛应用于游戏对弈、机器人控制和资源调度等领域，并展现出超越人类经验规则的潜力，那么在更复杂且开放的现实世界中，强化学习能否实现安全、可靠且可解释的自主决策呢？
samples.prediction: 强化学习是一种通过与环境交互来学习策略的机器学习方法，其核心是智能体通过奖励或惩罚来更新策略，从而在多次试错中逐步提升性能。随着深度学习和神经网络的发展，强化学习在游戏、机器人、自动驾驶等领域取得了显著成果，但仍面临隐私、安全和可解释性等挑战。强化学习是否能够在复杂实际任务中取得更高的效率与可靠性？

samples.instruction: Translate the following CS paper abstract into Chinese.
samples.input: Machine translation (MT) methods have evolved from rule-based systems to data-driven and neural approaches, reflecting advances in computational linguistics and machine learning. Early rule-based MT relied on handcrafted linguistic rules, bilingual dictionaries, and syntactic transfer models, which required extensive expert knowledge and exhibited limited scalability. Statistical machine translation (SMT) introduced a probabilistic framework, modeling translation as a noisy-channel process and l...
samples.reference: 机器翻译（Machine Translation，MT）方法已经从基于规则的系统演进到数据驱动和神经方法，反映了计算语言学和机器学习领域的进步。早期的基于规则的机器翻译依赖人工构建的语言规则、双语词典以及句法转换模型，这类方法需要大量专家知识，且可扩展性有限。统计机器翻译（Statistical Machine Translation，SMT）引入了概率框架，将翻译建模为噪声信道过程，并利用大规模平行语料学习词级和短语级对齐关系，典型代表包括 IBM 对齐模型以及结合 n-gram 语言模型的短语级 SMT。尽管 SMT 在翻译流畅度和覆盖范围方面取得了显著提升，但其仍受限于特征稀疏性和上下文建模能力不足的问题。神经机器翻译（Neural Machine Translation，NMT）通过采用端到端的神经网络架构来克服这些局限，通常基于带有 attention 机制的 encoder–decoder 范式。现代 NMT 系统主要采用 Transformer 架构，该架构依赖 self-attention 来捕获长程依赖关系，并支持高度并行化的训练过程。诸如子词切分技术（例如 byte-pair encoding 或 unigram language model）可以缓解未登录词（out-of-vocabulary）问题，而以最大似然估计（maximum likelihood estimation）为基础的优化目标则进一步通过序列级训练加以补充。尽管在 BLEU、COMET 等评价指标上翻译质量已取得显著提升，但在低资源场景、领域自适应以及系统鲁棒性方面仍然存在挑战。当前研究正积极探索多语言模型、基于大规模单语数据的预训练方法，以及更高效的解码策略，以进一步推动机器翻译性能的提升。
samples.prediction: 机器翻译（Machine Translation，MT）方法从基于规则的系统发展到数据驱动和神经方法，反映了计算语言学和机器学习领域的进步。早期的基于规则的 MT 依赖人工设计的语言规则、双语词典以及句法迁移模型，这些方法需要大量专业知识，并且具有有限的可扩展性。统计机器翻译（Statistical Machine Translation，SMT）引入了概率框架，将翻译建模为噪声信道过程，并利用大规模平行语料学习单词和短语对齐，其代表性模型包括 IBM 对齐模型以及基于 n-gram 的短语驱动 SMT。尽管 SMT 在翻译流畅性和覆盖率方面取得了显著提升，但其在特征稀疏性和上下文建模能力上存在局限。神经机器翻译（Neural Machine Translation，NMT）通过采用端到端神经架构来解决这些局限性，通常基于编码器–解码器（encoder–decoder）范式，并结合 attention 机制。现代 NMT 系统主要采用 Transformer 架构，这些架构依赖自注意力（self-attention）机制以捕获长程依赖关系，并实现高度可并行化的训练。子词划分技术（subword segmentation，如字节对编码或 unigram 语言模型）有效缓解了词典外词问题，而基于最大似然估计的优化目标在其上受到序列级训练的补充。尽管翻译质量

samples.instruction: Summarize the key contributions of this paper.
samples.input:
neutrinos are produced in states of given flavors  electron , muon or tau  that are mixtures of mass eigenstates . 
 as different masses propagate with different phases , the mixture at some distance from a neutrino source may be different from the initial one , resulting in a disappearance of the initial flavor and an appearance of other flavors in the neutrino beam . 
 quantitatively , the phase of the state of mass @xmath0 and momentum @xmath1 at the time @xmath2 from the production is @xmath...
samples.reference:
thanks to global efforts over the past two decades , the phenomenon of neutrino oscillations is now well established . in ongoing experiments , 
 the parameters driving the oscillations are being determined with rapidly increasing precision . 
 yet there still are open issues that have implications going well beyond neutrino physics . 
 the next two decades are expected to bring definite answers to the neutrino - mass hierarchy and violation of charge - particle ( cp ) symmetry in neutrino oscillations . 
 the question of the mass hierarchy  whether the neutrino masses follow the pattern of the charged - lepton masses  is relevant for cosmology , astrophysics and unification theories . 
 on the other hand , cp violating oscillations have the potential to give an important , or event dominant , contribution to the matter - antimatter asymmetry in the universe . 
 for the success of future neutrino - oscillation studies it is , however , necessary to ensure a significant reduction of uncertainties , particularly those related to neutrino - energy reconstruction . 
 we discuss different sources of systematic uncertainties , paying special attention to those arising from nuclear effects and detector response . analyzing nuclear effects 
 we show the importance of developing accurate theoretical models , capable to provide truly quantitative description of neutrino cross sections , together with the relevance of their implementation in monte carlo generators and extensive testing against scattering data . 
 we also point out the fundamental role of efforts aiming to determine detector response in test - beam exposures .

we review the neutrino oscillation phenomena and the experimental progress in the past two decades . 
 we discuss the theoretical framework for neutrino oscillations , the experimental methods and the current status of the measurements . 
 we also discuss the future prospects for neutrino oscillation experiments and the implications of the results for the standard model and beyond .

samples.instruction: 将下文译为英文，注意专业术语的准确性。
samples.input: 知识蒸馏是一种模型压缩与迁移学习技术，通过引入教师模型与学生模型的范式，将大模型中蕴含的暗知识有效传递给轻量模型。其核心思想是利用高温Softmax产生的软目标或中间特征作为监督信号，最小化学生输出分布与教师logits之间的KL散度，从而保留类别间的相对关系。现有方法可分为响应蒸馏、特征蒸馏与关系蒸馏，并可采用离线、在线或自蒸馏策略。在保证推理效率与参数规模显著降低的同时，蒸馏还能提升学生模型的泛化能力与稳定性。
samples.reference: Knowledge distillation is a model compression and transfer learning technique that adopts a teacher–student paradigm to effectively transfer the dark knowledge embedded in large models to lightweight models. Its core idea is to use soft targets generated by high-temperature Softmax or intermediate representations as supervision signals, and to minimize the KL divergence between the student’s output distribution and the teacher’s logits, thereby preserving the relative relationships among classes. Existing methods can be categorized into response distillation, feature distillation, and relation distillation, and can be implemented using offline, online, or self-distillation strategies. While significantly reducing inference cost and parameter scale, distillation can also enhance the generalization ability and stability of the student model.
samples.prediction: Knowledge distillation is a model compression and transfer learning technique that leverages the paradigm of a teacher model and a student model to effectively transfer the latent knowledge contained in large models into a lightweight model. The core idea is to use soft targets or intermediate features generated by a high-temperature Softmax as supervision signals, minimizing the KL divergence between the student’s output distribution and the teacher logits, thereby preserving the relative relationships among classes. Existing approaches can be categorized into response distillation, feature distillation, and relation distillation, and they can adopt offline, online, or self-distillation strategies. While preserving high inference efficiency and significantly reducing the model’s parameter scale, distillation also improves the generalization capability and stability of the student model.

samples.instruction: 描述Transformer架构的特点，不要使用'非常'、'很'等程度副词。
samples.reference:
Transformer 架构的主要特点包括：

- 采用自注意力机制，在序列内部建立任意位置之间的依赖关系。  
- 不依赖循环或卷积结构，通过并行计算处理序列数据。  
- 使用多头注意力，在不同表示子空间中建模信息。  
- 引入位置编码，为模型提供序列顺序信息。  
- 编码器与解码器由多层相同结构堆叠而成，结构清晰。  
- 在各子层之间加入残差连接与层归一化，支持稳定训练。
samples.prediction:
Transformer架构的特点包括：

- 基于自注意力机制，通过编码器层实现序列间的相互关系建模。  
- 采用多头自注意力，允许模型同时关注序列中不同位置的信息。  
- 无需依赖全连接层，依赖自注意力和前馈网络。  
- 由编码器和解码器组成，编码器负责前馈信息传递，解码器负责生成序列。  
- 通用模型，可应用于多种任务，如序列分类、序列到序列和机器翻译。  
- 依赖大量参数，通常结合注意力加速和并行计算。

samples.reference:
we investigate the superfluid behavior of a two - dimensional ( 2d ) bose gas of @xmath0rb atoms using classical field dynamics . in the experiment by r. desbuquois _ 
 et al . _ , nat 
 . phys . 
 * 8 * , 645 ( 2012 ) , a 2d quasicondensate in a trap is stirred by a blue - detuned laser beam along a circular path around the trap center . here 
 , we study this experiment from a theoretical perspective . the heating induced by stirring increases rapidly above a velocity @xmath1 , which we define as the critical velocity . 
 we identify the superfluid , the crossover , and the thermal regime by a finite , a sharply decreasing , and a vanishing critical velocity , respectively . 
 we demonstrate that the onset of heating occurs due to the creation of vortex - antivortex pairs . 
 a direct comparison of our numerical results to the experimental ones shows good agreement , if a systematic shift of the critical phase - space density is included . 
 we relate this shift to the absence of thermal equilibrium between the condensate and the thermal wings , which were used in the experiment to extract the temperature . 
 we expand on this observation by studying the full relaxation dynamics between the condensate and the thermal cloud .

we present an algorithm that computes the multipole coefficients of the galaxy three - point correlation function ( 3pcf ) without explicitly considering triplets of galaxies . rather , centering on each galaxy in the survey , it expands the radially - binned density field in spherical harmonics and combines these to form the multipoles without ever requiring the relative angle between a pair about the central . 
 this approach scales with number and number density in the same way as the two - point correlation function , allowing runtimes that are comparable , and 500 times faster than a naive triplet count . 
 it is exact in angle and easily handles edge correction . 
 we demonstrate the algorithm on the lasdamas sdss - dr7 mock catalogs , computing an edge corrected 3pcf out to @xmath0 in under an hour on modest computing resources . 
 we expect this algorithm will render it possible to obtain the large - scale 3pcf for upcoming surveys such as euclid , lsst , and desi . 
 cosmology : large - scale structure of universe , methods : data analysis , statistical

samples.instruction: 将下文翻译成中文，注意保留技术术语。
samples.input: AI safety and alignment concern the design of artificial agents whose behavior reliably conforms to human values, intentions, and constraints, even under conditions of uncertainty, scale, and distributional shift. From a technical perspective, alignment decomposes into outer alignment—whether the specified objective or reward function correctly encodes desired behavior—and inner alignment—whether the learned model develops internal representations and optimization strategies that remain aligned ...
samples.reference: AI 安全与对齐关注的是人工智能体的设计，使其行为即便在不确定性、规模化以及分布转移等条件下，仍能可靠地符合人类的价值观、意图和约束。从技术角度看，对齐可分解为外部对齐（outer alignment）与内部对齐（inner alignment）：前者关注所设定的目标或奖励函数是否正确编码了期望的行为，后者关注学习到的模型在训练和部署过程中，其内部表征与优化策略是否始终与该目标保持一致。诸如奖励误设（reward misspecification）、目标泛化错误（goal misgeneralization）以及涌现的欺骗性行为（emergent deceptive behavior）等失败案例，凸显了朴素优化方法的局限性。当前研究方法整合了包括基于人类反馈的强化学习（reinforcement learning from human feedback，RLHF）、宪法式 AI（constitutional AI）和偏好建模（preference modeling）在内的技术，以实现可扩展但仍不完美的监督。与此互补的研究聚焦于鲁棒性与可靠性，涵盖对抗训练（adversarial training）、不确定性估计（uncertainty estimation）以及分布外检测（out-of-distribution detection），以缓解脆弱或不安全行为。可解释性与机制透明性（mechanistic transparency）旨在揭示潜在表征和决策路径，从而支持审计并及早发现目标不对齐问题。形式化验证与控制理论方法试图提供可证明的安全性保证，而可纠正性（corrigibility）与可关闭性（shutdownability）则应对在日益自主的系统中维持人类控制这一挑战。至关重要的是，AI 安全并非一种静态属性，而是一个持续过程，需要在自我改进和部署反馈回路中进行持续监测、红队测试（red-teaming）以及动态对齐，因此成为先进 AI 系统面临的核心技术挑战之一。

 we find that the spectra of these two flares are well described by a two - blackbody ( 2bb ) model .

samples.instruction: What are the main points of the following content?
samples.input: 注意力机制作为Transformer架构的核心，在建模长程依赖和全局上下文方面具有显著优势，但其标准自注意力在序列长度增加时面临计算与显存复杂度为O(n²)的问题，成为大规模模型和长序列任务的主要瓶颈。针对这一背景，研究者从结构约束与计算近似两条路径对注意力机制进行改进。一类方法通过引入稀疏注意力、局部窗口或分块策略，限制注意力的感受野，在保持关键信息交互的同时降低计算量；另一类方法则采用线性注意力、低秩分解或核函数近似，将点积注意力转化为可线性计算的形式。此外，相对位置编码、多头注意力的参数共享与重加权机制，以及如FlashAttention等面向硬件优化的实现，也在提升数值稳定性和吞吐效率方面发挥了重要作用。部分工作还引入门控机制或动态路由，根据输入内容自适应分配注意力资源。综合实验结果表明，这些改进在机器翻译、长文本建模和多模态任务中显著降低了计算开销，并在相同或更低资源条件下保持甚至提升了模型性能，为可扩展注意力模型提供了有效路径。
samples.reference: 通过稀疏、近似与硬件优化改进注意力，实现长序列下的高效可扩展建模并保持性能。
samples.prediction: 为解决自注意力建模长序列瓶颈，研究从稀疏与近似注意力、硬件优化及门控机制等方向改进注意力机制，显著降低计算开销并提升可扩展性。

samples.instruction: What are the main differences between a computer and a smartphone in terms of performance and functionality? Your response should contain less than 200 words and include a postscript starting with "P.S."
samples.reference:
Computers and smartphones differ significantly in terms of performance and functionality. *Performance-wise*, computers generally have more powerful processors, larger RAM capacities, and higher storage options compared to smartphones. This allows computers to handle more demanding tasks such as video editing, software development, and running multiple applications simultaneously. Smartphones, while capable, are optimized for mobility and efficiency, making them ideal for quick tasks, communication, and media consumption on the go.

*Functionality-wise*, computers offer a wider range of input and output options, including full-sized keyboards, multiple display support, and a variety of ports for peripherals. Smartphones, on the other hand, excel in portability, touch-based interfaces, and integrated sensors like cameras and GPS. They are also designed to integrate seamlessly with mobile networks for internet access and cellular communication.

P.S. Despite these differences, both devices are essential in their own right, catering to different needs and lifestyles.
samples.prediction:
The main differences between a computer and a smartphone in terms of performance and functionality lie in their design, processing power, and intended use. Computers, particularly desktops and laptops, are built to handle more intensive tasks such as video editing, 3D rendering, and complex software applications. They typically feature more powerful processors, larger storage capacities, and higher RAM, allowing for smoother multitasking and better performance in resource-demanding tasks.

Smartphones, on the other hand, are optimized for mobile use and are designed to be compact, portable, and energy-efficient. They have more powerful processors but less space for expansion, and their performance is often limited by the size and weight constraints. Smartphones excel in everyday tasks like browsing the web, sending messages, and using apps, but they may struggle with more demanding applications.

In terms of functionality, computers offer a wider range of connectivity options, including multiple USB ports, HDMI outputs, and better Wi-Fi capabilities. They also support a variety of peripherals and can be upgraded more easily. Smartphones are more integrated with mobile networks and have built-in features like GPS, NFC, and touchscreens, making them ideal for on-the-go use.

P.S. Despite these differences, both devices have become increasingly powerful and versatile, blurring the lines between them.

samples.reference:
In the rapidly evolving landscape of modern society, the interplay between science, technology, and innovation has become more crucial than ever. These three pillars not only drive economic growth but also shape the way we live, work, and interact with the world around us. The advancements in technology have unlocked new possibilities, from artificial intelligence and machine learning to biotechnology and renewable energy solutions. Each of these fields is a testament to human ingenuity and the relentless pursuit of progress.

* Technology has revolutionized communication, making it faster and more accessible than ever before. With the advent of smartphones and high-speed internet, people can connect with each other across the globe in real-time.
* In the healthcare sector, technology has played a pivotal role in improving diagnostics and treatment options. Innovations such as telemedicine and wearable health devices have made healthcare more personalized and efficient.
* The integration of technology in education has transformed the learning experience, providing students with interactive tools and resources that enhance their understanding and engagement.

The synergy between science, technology, and innovation is a powerful force that propels us forward into a future filled with endless possibilities. As we continue to push the boundaries of what is possible, it is essential to foster an environment that encourages creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning.

P.S. The rapid pace of technological advancement underscores the importance of staying informed and adaptable in an ever-changing world.

samples.instruction: 阅读下文，用一句话概括其主要贡献。
samples.input:
随着深度学习模型规模的持续增长，模型在参数量、计算复杂度和存储开销方面不断攀升，给边缘计算、移动端部署以及低功耗场景带来了显著挑战。如何在保证模型精度的前提下降低资源消耗，成为工程落地中的关键问题，模型压缩与量化技术由此得到广泛关注。

模型压缩通常包括参数剪枝、低秩分解、知识蒸馏等方法。剪枝通过移除冗余或不重要的权重连接，减少模型参数规模；结构化剪枝还能直接降低实际推理延迟。低秩分解利用权重矩阵的内在冗余性，将其分解为多个低维矩阵，从而减少计算量。知识蒸馏则通过教师模型指导学生模型学习软标签或中间特征，在保持性能的同时显著缩小模型规模。

量化技术主要通过降低参数和激活的数值精度来减少模型的存储和计算成本，例如将32位浮点数转换为8位甚至更低比特的整数表示。根据量化阶段不同，可分为训练后量化（PTQ）和量化感知训练（QAT）。其中，QAT通过在训练阶段引入量化噪声，能够更好地缓解精度下降问题，适用于对精度要求较高的场景。

综合来看，模型压缩与量化技术能够在较小精度损失甚至无损的情况下，大幅降低模型体积和推理开销，是实现深度学习模型高效部署的重要手段。随着硬件对低比特运算的支持不断增...
samples.reference: 模型压缩与量化在保证精度的同时显著降低模型规模和计算开销，是高效部署深度学习模型的关键技术。
samples.prediction: 模型压缩与量化技术在保证精度的同时显著降低深度学习模型的资源消耗与部署成本。

samples.instruction: Summarize the key points of the following technical content.
samples.input:
Transformer架构在自然语言处理与多模态学习中取得了显著成功，但其自注意力机制的计算与显存复杂度随序列长度呈二次增长，限制了长上下文建模与大规模部署。随着模型规模和应用场景的扩展，如何在保持表达能力的同时降低计算成本，成为架构优化的核心问题。

针对上述瓶颈，研究者从注意力机制、参数组织和训练推理流程等方面提出了多种优化方案。在注意力层面，稀疏注意力、线性注意力以及基于分块与重排的FlashAttention，通过减少无效计算或改进内存访问模式，将复杂度从O(n²)降低到近线性水平。在模型结构上，Mixture of Experts（MoE）通过条件计算提升参数规模与计算效率的解耦，而参数共享与低秩分解则减少冗余参数。在推理阶段，引入KV Cache、量化与算子融合进一步降低延迟与显存占用。

综合来看，这些优化在不显著牺牲模型精度的前提下，大幅提升了训练吞吐与推理效率，使Transformer更适用于长序列建模和资源受限环境，也为下一代大模型架构设计提供了重要方向。
samples.reference: Transformer自注意力具O(n²)复杂度，限制长上下文与部署。通过稀疏/线性注意力、FlashAttention、MoE、参数共享与低秩分解，以及KV Cache和量化等推理优化，在保持精度下显著降低计算与显存成本，提升训练与推理效率。
samples.prediction: Transformer在NLP与多模态中成功，但自注意力复杂度O(n²)限制长上下文与部署。研究通过稀疏/线性注意力、FlashAttention降低复杂度；MoE解耦参数与计算；参数共享与低秩分解减少冗余；KV Cache、量化与算子融合降低推理成本，提升长序列建模与资源受限场景。

samples.instruction: 请提取以下论文片段的核心观点，并进行简要总结。
samples.input:
在监督学习中，过拟合与欠拟合是影响模型泛化性能的核心问题。欠拟合通常源于模型容量不足或特征表达能力有限，导致训练误差和测试误差同时偏高，体现为高偏差；过拟合则发生在模型过于复杂、对训练数据中的噪声和偶然模式进行学习时，训练误差很低但测试误差显著升高，表现为高方差。这两者本质上体现了偏差—方差权衡。

针对欠拟合问题，常见方法包括提升模型复杂度、引入更具判别力的特征、采用非线性模型或集成学习等；而缓解过拟合则需要控制模型自由度，例如通过正则化（L1/L2 正则）、参数约束、特征选择、数据增强以及降低模型容量。交叉验证可用于稳定评估模型泛化误差，避免因数据划分带来的评估偏差。

在训练过程中，学习曲线是诊断过拟合与欠拟合的重要工具。若训练与验证误差均较高，通常指向欠拟合；若二者差距较大，则暗示过拟合。此外，早停（Early Stopping）通过监控验证集损失，在性能恶化前终止训练，是深度学习中常用的隐式正则化手段。

总体而言，过拟合与欠拟合并非孤立问题，而是与数据规模、噪声水平、模型复杂度及优化策略密切相关。通过在模型能力与数据约束之间取得平衡，结合系统性的验证与正则化手段，才能获得具...
samples.reference: 欠拟合与过拟合体现偏差—方差权衡：前者模型容量不足、误差皆高，后者模型过复杂、训练低测高。提升复杂度与特征缓解欠拟合，正则化、特征选择、数据增强与降容量抑制过拟合；结合交叉验证、学习曲线与早停以提升泛化。
samples.prediction: 监督学习中欠拟合与过拟合源于偏差—方差权衡，分别表现为高偏差与高方差。欠拟合常源于模型容量不足，过拟合则源于模型过复杂。可通过提升模型能力、特征与正则化、交叉验证、学习曲线与早停来稳定训练并获得良好泛化。

samples.instruction: 用简洁的语言概括下文的主要观点。
samples.input:
随着深度学习模型规模不断扩大，参数量和计算复杂度显著增加，给边缘设备部署、实时推理和能耗控制带来严峻挑战。模型压缩与量化技术正是在这一背景下提出，旨在在尽量保持模型精度的前提下，降低模型存储、计算与带宽开销。

模型压缩通常包括剪枝、参数共享和知识蒸馏等方法。剪枝通过移除对输出贡献较小的权重或通道，实现稀疏化网络结构；知识蒸馏则利用教师模型指导轻量化学生模型学习软标签分布，从而在小模型中保留关键判别能力。量化技术则通过将浮点参数和激活映射为低比特表示，如INT8甚至INT4，显著减少存储占用并提升硬件执行效率。根据实施阶段不同，量化可分为后训练量化（PTQ）和量化感知训练（QAT），后者在训练过程中显式建模量化误差，通常能获得更优的精度表现。

在实际应用中，模型压缩与量化往往需要结合硬件特性和任务需求进行协同设计，以平衡精度、延迟和能耗等指标。大量实验表明，合理的压缩与量化方案可在精度损失可控的情况下，将模型体积缩小数倍，并显著提升推理吞吐率，为大模型在移动端和嵌入式场景中的落地提供了关键技术支撑。
samples.reference: 模型压缩与量化用于应对大模型规模与算力挑战，在尽量保持精度的前提下降低存储和计算开销。关键方法包括剪枝、知识蒸馏及低比特量化（PTQ、QAT），并需结合硬件与任务协同设计，以提升边缘与嵌入式推理效率。
samples.prediction: 模型压缩与量化通过剪枝、蒸馏和低比特量化降低模型规模与计算开销，可在保持精度的同时显著提升边缘推理性能，是大模型在移动端落地的关键技术。

samples.instruction: Briefly summarize the following passage.
samples.input:
在深度学习与大规模优化问题中，优化器直接决定模型的收敛速度、稳定性与泛化性能。传统的随机梯度下降及其动量变体在非凸、高噪声场景下易出现震荡与收敛缓慢。自适应方法如Adam、RMSProp虽然加速了早期训练，但存在泛化退化与学习率失配问题。因此，对优化器算法进行系统性改进成为当前研究的重点。

近年来的改进主要围绕梯度估计、学习率调度与正则化机制展开。一类方法通过引入偏差校正与二阶矩重参数化，降低自适应步长的噪声放大效应。另一类方法结合动量与权重衰减解耦，如AdamW，以改善参数更新的几何一致性。在分布式训练中，采用梯度裁剪、延迟补偿与方差缩减技术，可缓解通信与异步带来的不稳定。此外，基于损失曲率的自适应学习率或周期性退火策略，有助于跳出鞍点并提升收敛下界。这些方案通常在理论上给出收敛性或后验稳定性分析。

实验结果表明，改进后的优化器在相同计算预算下显著缩短训练轮数。在视觉与自然语言任务中，其最终测试误差与泛化间隙均优于基线方法。同时，对超参数的敏感性降低，提高了工程可复现性。从实践角度看，优化器改进应结合模型结构、数据分布与硬件特性进行协同设计。总体而言，面向稳定性与泛化的优化器算法...
samples.reference: 深度学习中优化器影响收敛与泛化。研究通过偏差校正、动量与权重衰减解耦、自适应学习率及分布式稳定技术，提升训练稳定性与效率，实验表明其在多任务中收敛更快、泛化更优，具持续研究价值。
samples.prediction: 深度学习优化器对收敛速度、稳定性与泛化关系密切。近年改进主要通过梯度估计、学习率调度与正则化机制，结合偏差校正、权重衰减解耦、分布式训练技术及自适应策略，显著提升训练效率与泛化性能，同时降低超参数敏感性。

samples.instruction: Extract the main ideas from the following text.
samples.input:
在大语言模型等生成式模型中，幻觉问题指模型在缺乏充分证据或超出训练分布时，生成看似合理但事实错误或不可验证的内容。这一问题源于概率建模本质、训练语料噪声以及目标函数偏向流畅性而非真实性，在问答、检索增强生成和自动决策场景中具有较高风险。

针对幻觉问题，研究与工程实践中提出了多种缓解方案。在训练阶段，通过高质量数据清洗、去重与标注一致性控制，结合指令微调与人类反馈强化学习（RLHF），可降低模型学习到错误关联的概率。在推理阶段，引入检索增强生成（RAG），将外部知识库或搜索结果作为条件输入，使生成过程受可验证证据约束；同时结合不确定性估计、置信度校准与拒答机制，避免模型在低置信场景下强行作答。

此外，解码策略与系统层设计同样关键。采用基于约束的解码、事实一致性判别器或后验验证模块，可以在生成后对内容进行自动校验与修正。在评估方面，除传统自动指标外，引入基于事实一致性和可追溯性的评测体系，有助于量化幻觉风险。

总体来看，幻觉问题难以通过单一技术彻底消除，但通过数据、模型、推理与系统多层协同设计，可以显著降低其发生频率和影响范围，为可信人工智能系统的构建奠定基础。
samples.reference: 大模型幻觉源于概率建模与数据噪声，易在问答等场景引发风险。缓解手段包括高质量数据与RLHF训练、RAG与置信度控制、约束解码和事实校验评测，通过多层协同显著降低幻觉。
samples.prediction: 幻觉问题源于概率建模、数据噪声和目标函数偏向流畅性，主要在问答、检索增强生成和自动决策中存在风险。缓解方法包括训练阶段的高质量数据与RLHF、推理阶段的RAG与不确定性校准，以及系统层的约束式解码与事实一致性评测，多层协同设计可显著降低幻觉风险。

samples.reference: 自然语言处理是人工智能领域的重要分支，旨在让计算机理解和生成自然语言，近年来随着深度学习技术的发展取得了显著进展，通过大规模语料训练的模型在语义理解、机器翻译和对话系统中表现出色，而在实际应用中还需要不断进行算法优化与模型优化，以提升效率、准确性和可扩展性。
samples.prediction: 自然语言处理是人工智能领域的重要分支，旨在让计算机理解、生成和处理人类语言。近年来，随着深度学习技术的发展，模型能力显著提升，使其在语音识别、机器翻译和对话系统等方面取得了显著成果。为了进一步提升性能，研究者不断探索新的算法和数据结构，通过持续优化模型参数和结构，使其在准确性、效率和泛化能力上达到更高水平。

samples.instruction: Translate the following Chinese text into English.
samples.input: 情感分析算法旨在从自然语言文本中自动识别情绪极性与强度。传统方法基于情感词典与规则匹配，依赖人工构建的先验知识，鲁棒性有限。现代方法以机器学习与深度学习为核心，通过词嵌入、上下文表示和注意力机制建模语义依赖，常采用CNN、RNN及Transformer架构，并借助预训练语言模型进行微调。在训练与评估中需处理噪声标注、类别不平衡与领域迁移问题，常用指标包括Accuracy、F1和AUC。
samples.reference: Sentiment analysis algorithms aim to automatically identify the polarity and intensity of emotions from natural language text. Traditional approaches are based on sentiment lexicons and rule matching, relying on manually constructed prior knowledge and exhibiting limited robustness. Modern methods center on machine learning and deep learning, modeling semantic dependencies through word embeddings, contextual representations, and attention mechanisms. They commonly employ CNN, RNN, and Transformer architectures, and leverage pre-trained language models for fine-tuning. During training and evaluation, challenges such as noisy labels, class imbalance, and domain adaptation must be addressed. Commonly used evaluation metrics include Accuracy, F1-score, and AUC.
samples.prediction: Sentiment analysis algorithms aim to automatically identify emotional polarity and intensity from natural language text. Traditional approaches are based on sentiment lexicons and rule-based matching, relying on manually constructed prior knowledge, and exhibit limited robustness. Modern approaches are centered on machine learning and deep learning, modeling semantic dependencies through word embeddings, contextual representations, and attention mechanisms. Common architectures include CNNs, RNNs, and Transformers, and are often fine-tuned on pretrained language models. During training and evaluation, issues such as noisy annotations, class imbalance, and domain adaptation must be addressed, with commonly used metrics including Accuracy, F1 score, and AUC.

samples.instruction: Briefly summarize the following passage.
samples.input: Federated learning (FL) has emerged as a promising paradigm to address the tension between data-driven model development and stringent data privacy, security, and regulatory constraints. In many real-world domains such as healthcare, finance, and mobile services, sensitive data are distributed across multiple organizations or edge devices and cannot be centrally collected due to legal, ethical, or competitive concerns. Traditional centralized machine learning pipelines, which require aggregating...
samples.reference: 联邦学习通过在本地保留数据、仅共享模型更新，实现多方协同训练，缓解隐私与合规约束。其核心机制为本地训练与服务器聚合（如FedAvg）。主要挑战包括非IID数据、通信开销、客户端不稳定及隐私泄露风险，常结合安全聚合与差分隐私加以应对。

samples.instruction: 请对以下内容进行摘要，突出关键信息。
samples.input:
在生产环境中，机器学习模型面临的数据分布与训练阶段往往存在差异，业务变化、用户行为演化以及外部环境扰动都会导致模型性能随时间退化。因此，模型监控与维护成为MLOps体系中的关键环节，其目标是在保证系统稳定性的同时，持续维持模型的业务价值。

模型监控通常从数据、模型与系统三个层面展开。在数据层，需要监控特征分布、缺失率和异常值，通过统计距离或假设检验识别数据漂移与概念漂移；在模型层，关注预测准确率、AUC、校准度等指标，并结合标签延迟问题设计近线评估方案；在系统层，则需跟踪推理延迟、吞吐量和资源利用率，防止性能瓶颈影响线上服务。

在维护策略上，可结合自动化告警与闭环优化机制。当监控指标触发阈值时，通过日志与特征回溯定位问题根因，并采用定期重训练、增量学习或迁移学习进行模型更新。同时，引入CI/CD流程、影子部署和A/B测试，可以在不影响主业务的前提下验证新模型效果，降低发布风险。

实践表明，完善的模型监控与维护体系能够显著提升模型生命周期管理能力，不仅减少性能衰减带来的业务损失，还提高了系统的可解释性与可靠性，为大规模智能应用的长期运行提供了坚实保障。
samples.reference: 生产环境中模型易因数据分布变化而性能退化，需在MLOps中强化监控与维护。从数据、模型、系统三层监控漂移、效果与性能，结合告警、回溯、重训练及CI/CD、A/B测试，实现安全迭代与业务价值持续。
samples.prediction: 生产环境中模型难以适应数据漂移与业务变化，需通过监控与维护提升MLOps。监控数据、模型与系统三层指标，结合自动告警、重训练、增量学习及CI/CD与A/B测试，可持续提升模型稳定性、性能与可靠性。

samples.instruction: English translation:
samples.input: 联邦学习是一种面向隐私保护的分布式机器学习范式，通过在数据本地保留的前提下进行协同建模，避免原始数据集中化带来的合规与泄露风险。其典型流程以FedAvg等算法为核心，在多轮通信中由客户端执行局部梯度更新，服务器进行模型参数聚合。联邦学习需应对非独立同分布（Non-IID）数据、系统与统计异质性、通信开销受限等挑战，常结合安全聚合、差分隐私、同态加密与自适应优化策略，以在模型性能、效率与隐私保障之间取得平衡。
samples.reference: Federated learning is a privacy-preserving distributed machine learning paradigm that enables collaborative model training while keeping data localized, thereby avoiding compliance and data leakage risks associated with centralized raw data collection. Its typical workflow centers on algorithms such as FedAvg, where clients perform local gradient updates over multiple communication rounds and a server aggregates model parameters. Federated learning must address challenges including non-independent and identically distributed (Non-IID) data, system and statistical heterogeneity, and constrained communication overhead. It is often combined with techniques such as secure aggregation, differential privacy, homomorphic encryption, and adaptive optimization strategies to strike a balance among model performance, efficiency, and privacy protection.
samples.prediction: Federated learning is a privacy-preserving distributed machine learning paradigm that achieves collaborative modeling by keeping data local, thereby avoiding compliance and privacy leakage risks associated with data centralization in the original dataset. Its typical workflow is centered around algorithms such as FedAvg, in which clients perform local gradient updates and servers aggregate model parameters across multiple rounds of communication. Federated learning must address challenges including non-independent and identically distributed (non-IID) data, heterogeneity between systems and statistics, and communication overhead constraints. To achieve a balance among model performance, efficiency, and privacy guarantees, it is commonly combined with techniques such as secure aggregation, differential privacy, homomorphic encryption, and adaptive optimization strategies.

samples.instruction: 用简洁的语言概括下文的主要观点。
samples.input:
在深度学习模型训练过程中，优化器算法直接影响模型的收敛速度、稳定性及最终性能。随着模型规模和参数维度的不断增大，传统随机梯度下降（SGD）及其动量变种在复杂非凸优化问题中逐渐暴露出收敛慢、对学习率敏感等问题，难以满足大规模训练需求。因此，对优化器算法进行改进成为提升训练效率和模型性能的重要研究方向。

现有改进方法主要围绕自适应学习率和梯度估计展开。例如，AdaGrad、RMSProp 和 Adam 等算法通过引入一阶和二阶梯度矩估计，实现了对不同参数维度的自适应步长调整，从而缓解了梯度稀疏和尺度不一致的问题。近年来，研究者进一步发现 Adam 在泛化性能和收敛稳定性方面存在缺陷，进而提出了 AdamW、AMSGrad 等改进算法，通过解耦权重衰减或修正二阶矩偏置，增强理论收敛性。此外，一些工作将二阶信息、梯度噪声建模以及学习率调度策略相结合，以提高在非平稳目标函数上的优化效果。

实验结果表明，改进后的优化器在大规模数据集和深层神经网络上通常能够获得更快的收敛速度和更优的泛化性能，同时降低对人工调参的依赖。总体而言，优化器算法的持续改进为高效、稳定地训练复杂模型提供了重要支撑，也为未...
samples.reference: 深度学习训练中，传统SGD在大规模非凸问题上收敛慢且敏感。AdaGrad、RMSProp、Adam等通过自适应学习率提升效率，但Adam存在泛化问题，AdamW、AMSGrad等加以改进。实验表明，新型优化器加快收敛、提升泛化并降低调参成本。
samples.prediction: 深度学习优化器改进旨在解决SGD收敛慢、学习率敏感等问题。通过自适应学习率、梯度估计及二阶信息，AdaGrad、RMSProp、Adam、AdamW、AMSGrad等提升了收敛速度、稳定性与泛化性能，降低对人工调参的依赖。

Please ensure the instructions are clear and easy to follow, suitable for someone with basic technical knowledge. [keyword] is "network" and [forbidden_words] is "password".
samples.reference:
<<Setting Up Your Home Network>>

Setting up a home network can be a straightforward process if you follow these detailed steps. First, you will need a few essential pieces of equipment: a modem, a router, and the devices you want to connect to the network.

1. **Connect the Modem**: Plug the modem into a power outlet and connect it to your internet service provider's line using the appropriate cable. This is usually an Ethernet cable or a telephone line, depending on your service.

2. **Set Up the Router**: Once the modem is powered on, connect the router to the modem using an Ethernet cable. Plug one end into the modem and the other into the WAN (Wide Area Network) port on the router.

3. **Power On the Router**: Plug the router into a power outlet and turn it on. Wait a few minutes for it to initialize and connect to the modem.

4. **Connect Devices**: To connect your devices to the network, you can use either wired or wireless connections. For wired connections, use Ethernet cables to connect your devices directly to the router. For wireless connections, ensure your devices are within range of the router and have Wi-Fi enabled.

5. **Configure the Network**: Access the router's settings by opening a web browser and entering the router’s IP address in the address bar. Common IP addresses are 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.0.1. Log in using the default credentials provided by the router manufacturer.

6. **Set Up Wi-Fi**: In the router’s settings, navigate to the Wi-Fi configuration section. Create a unique network name (SSID) and choose a security protocol. For the best security, use WPA3 if available, or WPA2 as a fallback. Avoid using WEP due to its vulnerabilities.

7. **Secure Your Network**: Change the default login credentials for the router to something more secure. This helps prevent unauthorized access to your network settings. Also, enable the firewall to add an extra layer of protection.

8. **Manage Devices**: Some routers allow you to manage connected devices from the settings panel. You can set up device-specific rules, such as bandwidth limits or access times, to ensure a smooth and fair network experience.

9. **Test Your Connection**: Once everything is set up, test the connection on each device to ensure it is working properly. Open a web browser and try to access a website to verify the internet connection.

10. **Troubleshooting Tips**: If you encounter any issues, check the connections, restart the devices, and refer to the router’s user manual for troubleshooting steps. Most routers have built-in diagnostic tools that can help identify and resolve common problems.

P.S. Remember to keep your network settings updated and secure to protect your devices and personal data. Regularly check for firmware updates for your router to ensure it has the latest security patches.
samples.prediction:
<<Setting Up a Secure Home Network>>

To set up a secure home network, start by choosing a reliable router that suits your needs. Connect the router to your modem using an Ethernet cable, and then power on both devices. Open a web browser and enter the router’s IP address, which is usually found in the documentation or on a sticker on the router itself. This will take you to the router’s setup page.

From the setup page, log in with the default username and password, which are often printed on the router. Once logged in, configure the network settings such as the network name (SSID) and the encryption type. It’s recommended to use WPA3 encryption for enhanced security. After setting up the network, update the router’s firmware to ensure it has the latest security patches.

Next, connect your devices to the new network. For smartphones and tablets, use the Wi-Fi network name (SSID) and the encryption type you set up earlier. For computers and other devices, you can manually enter the SSID and the encryption type in the Wi-Fi settings. Once connected, you can start exploring your new network.

To secure your home network, enable the firewall and disable remote management. This will help protect your network from unauthorized access. Consider setting up a guest network for visitors, so they have a separate connection without access to your main network. You can also enable network monitoring to keep an eye on connected devices and detect any suspicious activity.

For an added layer of security, consider using a network security key (NOK) to restrict access to your network. This key can be set up in the router’s settings and shared with trusted users. Regularly check the list of connected devices and disconnect any that you don’t recognize.

Finally, keep your router and all connected devices updated with the latest software and security patches. This will help protect your network from vulnerabilities and ensure a secure browsing experience. By following these steps, you can create a secure and reliable home network that keeps your data safe and your devices connected.

P.S. If you encounter any issues during the setup process, refer to the router’s user manual or contact the manufacturer’s support for assistance.

简要总结以下技术文章的核心论点。
samples.input:
在计算机视觉领域，卷积神经网络（CNN）长期占据主导地位，但其局部感受野和固定卷积结构在建模全局依赖关系时存在局限。随着自然语言处理领域中Transformer架构的成功，研究者开始探索其在视觉任务中的适用性，视觉Transformer（Vision Transformer，ViT）由此提出，旨在利用自注意力机制捕获图像的全局语义信息。

视觉Transformer的核心思想是将图像视为序列数据进行建模。具体而言，输入图像首先被划分为固定大小的图像块（patch），每个patch经线性映射后形成嵌入向量，并与位置编码相加以保留空间信息。这些嵌入序列随后输入标准Transformer编码器，通过多头自注意力机制（Multi-Head Self-Attention）和前馈网络，实现不同空间位置之间的长程依赖建模。相比卷积操作，自注意力在理论上具备全局建模能力，能够动态分配不同区域的重要性权重。

在效果方面，ViT在大规模数据集（如ImageNet-21K）上进行预训练后，在图像分类、目标检测和语义分割等任务中展现出与甚至超越CNN的性能。同时，其结构更具统一性和可扩展性，便于与多模态模型...
samples.reference: 视觉Transformer将图像划分为patch并序列化建模，利用自注意力实现全局依赖建模，弥补CNN局限。在大规模预训练下性能优越，但对数据和算力依赖较高。
samples.prediction: 视觉Transformer通过将图像划分为patch序列并利用自注意力机制捕获全局语义，显著提升了视觉建模能力。在大规模数据上表现优越，具备高可扩展性，但对数据规模和计算资源敏感。

samples.instruction: 概括下文的主要内容和贡献。
samples.input:
注意力机制最早在序列建模中用于缓解长距离依赖问题，尤其在Transformer架构中成为核心组件。然而，标准自注意力在计算和存储上具有 \(O(n^2)\) 的复杂度，随着序列长度增加会带来显著的效率瓶颈，同时对局部结构与噪声信息缺乏区分能力，这些问题在长文本建模和多模态任务中尤为突出。

针对上述不足，研究者从结构和计算两方面对注意力机制进行了改进。一类方法通过稀疏化或局部化注意力连接，如滑动窗口注意力、块状注意力和全局—局部混合注意力，以降低无关位置之间的计算开销。另一类方法引入线性注意力思想，通过核函数近似或低秩分解，将复杂度降至线性级别。此外，相对位置编码、旋转位置编码等技术增强了模型对顺序和结构信息的建模能力，而动态注意力和门控机制则使模型能够自适应地分配关注权重，抑制噪声干扰。

综合实验结果表明，这些改进在保持甚至提升模型性能的同时，显著降低了时间和显存消耗，尤其在长序列和大规模预训练场景中效果明显。总体来看，注意力机制的改进为构建高效、可扩展的深度模型提供了重要方向，也为后续通用人工智能系统的设计奠定了基础。
samples.reference: 注意力机制虽缓解长依赖，但自注意力具O(n^2)复杂度且易受噪声影响。研究通过稀疏/局部注意力、线性注意力及位置编码与动态门控，降低计算与显存开销并增强结构建模，在长序列与大规模预训练中显著提升效率与性能。
samples.prediction: 注意力机制改进旨在缓解标准自注意力的 \(O(n^2)\) 复杂度与局部建模能力不足。通过稀疏/局部注意力、线性注意力、相对位置编码及动态门控，显著降低计算与存储开销，提升长序列和大规模预训练模型性能。

samples.input:
the issue of whether increasing the complexity of a network contributes to its dynamical instability has long been debated . 
 this ` complexity vs stability ' debate is especially acute in the field of ecology @xcite , as it relates to the importance of diversity for the long - term survival of ecosystems . 
 however , understanding the relation between the network structure and its stability ( with respect to dynamical perturbations ) is crucial , as it is related to the robustness of systems ...
samples.reference:
according to the may - wigner stability theorem , increasing the complexity of a network inevitably leads to its destabilization , such that a small perturbation will be able to disrupt the entire system . 
 one of the principal arguments against this observation is that it is valid only for random networks , and therefore does not apply to real - world networks , which presumably are structured . 
 here we examine how the introduction of small - world topological structure into networks affect their stability . 
 our results indicate that , in structured networks , the parameter values at which the stability - instability transition occurs with increasing complexity is identical to that predicted by the may - wigner criteria . however , the nature of the transition , as measured by the finite - size scaling exponent , appears to change as the network topology transforms from regular to random , with the small - world regime as the cross - over region . 
 this behavior is related to the localization of the largest eigenvalues along the real axis in the eigenvalue plain with increasing regularity in the network .

samples.instruction: 将下面这段计算机领域的学术摘要翻译成中文。
samples.input: Prompt engineering is a systematic methodology for designing, structuring, and optimizing natural language inputs to effectively control the behavior of large language models (LLMs) under specific task constraints. At its core, it operationalizes principles from instruction tuning, human–computer interaction, and probabilistic text generation to shape model outputs without modifying underlying parameters. Common techniques include zero-shot, few-shot, and in-context learning, where exemplars are...
samples.reference: 提示工程（Prompt Engineering）是一种系统化的方法论，用于设计、组织和优化自然语言输入，以在特定任务约束下有效地控制大语言模型（LLMs）的行为。从本质上看，它将指令微调（instruction tuning）、人机交互（human–computer interaction）以及概率文本生成的原理加以操作化，在不修改模型底层参数的情况下塑造模型输出。常见技术包括零样本（zero-shot）、少样本（few-shot）和上下文学习（in-context learning），即将示例直接嵌入提示中，以诱导模型产生特定任务行为。更高级的策略，如思维链提示（chain-of-thought prompting）、自一致性解码（self-consistency decoding）和基于角色的提示（role-based prompting），能够提升推理保真度、减少幻觉现象，并增强可解释性。提示工程师还需要管理 token 预算、输出模式（output schemas）以及解码超参数（如 temperature、top-p），以在确定性和多样性之间取得平衡。在生产环境中，提示工程还涉及系统层面的关注点，例如提示注入攻击（prompt injection attacks）、与安全策略的一致性，以及在对抗性或模糊输入下的鲁棒性。将提示与检索增强生成（retrieval-augmented generation，RAG）流水线相结合，可进一步实现对外部知识库的依赖，从而缓解模型陈旧性和事实性错误。最新研究正在探索自动化和无梯度（gradient-free）的提示优化方法，包括提示搜索（prompt search）、软提示（soft prompts）以及基于强化学习的评估闭环。随着大语言模型向多模态和智能体（agentic）架构演进，提示工程仍然是将人类意图转化为可靠、可控且可审计模型行为的关键接口。

samples.reference:
<<Best Practices for Managing a Remote Team>>

To effectively manage a remote team, the first and foremost solution is to implement robust communication tools and protocols. Regular virtual meetings, clear guidelines, and an open-door policy can help foster a sense of connection and transparency among team members. It is crucial to establish clear goals and expectations for each team member, ensuring everyone understands their roles and responsibilities. Additionally, providing adequate training and resources for remote work can significantly enhance productivity and job satisfaction. ***

Another key solution involves leveraging technology to streamline processes and maintain efficiency. Tools such as project management software, virtual collaboration platforms, and time-tracking apps can help keep everyone on the same page and ensure tasks are completed on time. Regular check-ins and feedback sessions are also essential to address any challenges and provide support. By implementing these solutions, managers can create a cohesive and productive remote work environment.
