we present in this paper our work regarding simulating a type of p system known as a spiking neural p system ( snp system ) using graphics processing units ( gpus ) . 
 gpus , because of their architectural optimization for parallel computations , are well - suited for highly parallelizable problems . due to the advent of general purpose gpu computing in recent years , gpus are not limited to graphics and video processing alone , but include computationally intensive scientific and mathematical applications as well 
 . moreover p systems , including snp systems , are inherently and maximally parallel computing models whose inspirations are taken from the functioning and dynamics of a living cell . 
 in particular , snp systems try to give a modest but formal representation of a special type of cell known as the neuron and their interactions with one another . 
 the nature of snp systems allowed their representation as matrices , which is a crucial step in simulating them on highly parallel devices such as gpus . 
 the highly parallel nature of snp systems necessitate the use of hardware intended for parallel computations . 
 the simulation algorithms , design considerations , and implementation are presented . finally , simulation results , observations , and analyses using an snp system that generates all numbers in @xmath0 - \{@xmath1 } are discussed , as well as recommendations for future work .

 such a rise implies a constant - density core for the host dark - matter halo @xcite , and is in conflict with the central dens...
samples.reference:
we carry out ray tracing through five high resolution simulations of a galaxy cluster to study how its ability to produce giant gravitationally lensed arcs is influenced by the collision cross - section of its dark matter . in three cases typical dark matter particles in the cluster core 
 undergo between 1 and 100 collisions per hubble time ; two more explore the long ( `` collisionless '' ) and short ( `` fluid '' ) mean free path limits . 
 we study the size and shape distributions of arcs and compute the cross - section for producing `` extreme '' arcs of various sizes . 
 even a few collisions per particle modify the core structure enough to destroy the cluster s ability to produce long , thin arcs . for larger collision frequencies the cluster must be scaled up to unrealistically large masses before it regains the ability to produce giant arcs . 
 none of our models with self - interacting dark matter ( except the `` fluid '' limit ) is able to produce radial arcs ; even the case with the smallest scattering cross - section must be scaled to the upper limit of observed cluster masses before it produces radial arcs . 
 apparently the elastic collision cross - section of dark matter in clusters must be very small , below 0.1 @xmath0g@xmath1 , to be compatible with the observed ability of clusters to produce both radial arcs and giant arcs . 
 dark matter  gravitational lensing 
 cosmology : theory  galaxies : clusters

samples.instruction: 简要总结以下技术文章的核心论点。
samples.input: 命名实体识别是自然语言处理中的基础任务，目标是在非结构化文本中自动识别并分类具有特定语义的实体，如人名、地名、组织机构和时间表达式。该任务是信息抽取、知识图谱构建和问答系统的重要前置环节，其性能直接影响下游应用的整体效果。早期方法多基于规则和词典，依赖人工特征工程，泛化能力有限。随后，统计学习方法将该问题建模为序列标注任务，采用隐马尔可夫模型和条件随机场，并引入BIO或BILOU标注体系以刻画实体边界。随着深度学习的发展，基于神经网络的模型成为主流，其中LSTM-CRF通过结合上下文表示和全局解码显著提升了性能。近年来，Transformer架构和预训练语言模型如BERT进一步推动了命名实体识别的发展，利用上下文化表示和微调策略，在多领域和多语言场景下取得了更高的F1值。同时，研究者也提出了基于跨度的建模方法以应对嵌套实体问题。实验结果表明，结合大规模预训练与领域自适应技术，能够有效提升召回率和鲁棒性。总体而言，命名实体识别正从特征驱动走向表示驱动，但在低资源和跨域场景下仍存在挑战。
samples.reference: 命名实体识别是信息抽取的基础任务，经历了从规则与统计模型到深度学习的发展。当前以Transformer和预训练模型为主，通过上下文化表示和领域自适应显著提升性能，但低资源与跨域场景仍具挑战。

samples.instruction: 请将以下内容翻译成英文，保持学术风格。
samples.input: 边缘计算推理是指将训练完成的机器学习或深度学习模型部署在靠近数据源的边缘设备上执行推断，以降低端到端时延、减少回传带宽并提升系统实时性。其核心技术包括模型压缩、剪枝与量化、知识蒸馏以及针对CPU、GPU或NPU的硬件加速优化。在资源受限环境下，需要结合异构计算调度、内存管理与功耗控制，实现高吞吐与低能耗的平衡。同时，边缘推理通过本地处理敏感数据，可增强隐私保护与系统可靠性，广泛应用于智能制造、自动驾驶与物联网场景。
samples.reference: Edge computing inference refers to deploying trained machine learning or deep learning models on edge devices close to data sources to perform inference, thereby reducing end-to-end latency, decreasing backhaul bandwidth usage, and improving system real-time performance. Its core technologies include model compression, pruning and quantization, knowledge distillation, and hardware acceleration optimizations for CPUs, GPUs, or NPUs. In resource-constrained environments, it is necessary to combine heterogeneous computing scheduling, memory management, and power control to achieve a balance between high throughput and low energy consumption. Meanwhile, by processing sensitive data locally, edge inference can enhance privacy protection and system reliability, and is widely applied in scenarios such as intelligent manufacturing, autonomous driving, and the Internet of Things.

the pairing hamiltonian constitutes an important approximation in many- body systems , it is exactly soluble and quantum integrable . on the other hand , the continuum single particle level density ( cspld ) contains information about the continuum energy spectrum . 
 the question whether one can use the hamiltonian with constant pairing strength for correlations in the continuum is still unanswered . in this paper 
 we generalize the richardson exact solution for the pairing hamiltonian including correlations in the continuum . 
 the resonant and non - resonant continuum are included through the cspld . 
 the resonant correlations are made explicit by using the cauchy theorem . 
 low lying states with seniority zero and two are calculated for the even carbon isotopes . 
 we conclude that energy levels can indeed be calculated with constant pairing in the continuum using the cspld . 
 it is found that the nucleus @xmath0c is unbound . 
 the real and complex energy representation of the continuum is developed and their differences are shown . 
 the trajectory of the pair energies in the continuum for the nucleus @xmath1c is shown .

samples.instruction: 以问答形式介绍计算机视觉，包含至少3个问题和回答。
samples.reference:
**问1：什么是计算机视觉？**  
**答：**计算机视觉是人工智能的一个重要分支，研究如何让计算机从图像或视频中获取、理解和分析信息，从而实现类似人类“看”和“理解”的能力。

**问2：计算机视觉主要能做哪些事情？**  
**答：**计算机视觉可以完成图像分类、目标检测、人脸识别、图像分割、姿态识别等任务，广泛应用于安防监控、自动驾驶、医疗影像分析等领域。

**问3：计算机视觉的核心技术有哪些？**  
**答：**核心技术包括图像处理、特征提取、机器学习以及深度学习，其中卷积神经网络（CNN）在现代计算机视觉中起着关键作用。

**问4：计算机视觉在日常生活中有哪些应用？**  
**答：**日常生活中的应用包括手机人脸解锁、相册中的自动人物分类、智能摄像头、自动驾驶辅助系统以及电商平台的以图搜图功能。

**问：计算机视觉与传统视觉有什么区别？**  
**答：**传统视觉是指人类通过感知来理解世界，而计算机视觉是通过算法和模型来模拟人类视觉，强调数据驱动和算法优化。

**问：计算机视觉的未来发展趋势是什么？**  
**答：**未来计算机视觉将更加注重实时性、准确性和可解释性，同时还会在深度学习、多模态感知和边缘计算等方面发展迅速。

What are the best ways to celebrate the arrival of spring?

<<Celebrating Spring: Embracing Joy and Happiness>>

*Spring is a season of renewal and rejuvenation, a time when nature awakens from its winter slumber.* To celebrate the arrival of spring, there are many delightful ways to embrace the beauty and warmth it brings. Here are some of the best ways to welcome the season:

1. **Organize a Spring Cleaning Day**
   - Start by decluttering your home and creating a fresh, inviting atmosphere. Open the windows to let in the fresh air and the scent of blooming flowers. This is a great way to *refresh* your living space and prepare for the new season.

2. **Plan a Garden Party**
   - Gather friends and family for a garden party. Decorate with colorful flowers and enjoy the outdoors. You can have a *picnic* with light, refreshing foods, or set up a few tables and chairs in a sunny spot. Playing music and games can add to the fun and *happiness*.

3. **Go on a Nature Walk**
   - Take a stroll in a local park or nature reserve. The sights and sounds of spring, from the blooming flowers to the chirping birds, can uplift your spirits and bring a sense of *joy*. It’s a perfect way to connect with nature and appreciate the beauty around you.

4. **Start a New Hobby**
   - Spring is an excellent time to try something new. Whether it’s gardening, painting, or photography, a new hobby can be a rewarding way to spend your free time. *Spring* weather provides the perfect backdrop for outdoor activities that can inspire creativity and relaxation.

*By embracing these activities, you can fully enjoy the pleasures of spring and fill your days with happiness and joy.*

samples.instruction: 将下面这段计算机领域的学术摘要翻译成中文。
samples.input: AI safety and alignment address the challenge of ensuring that advanced artificial intelligence systems reliably pursue intended objectives while remaining robust to misuse, distributional shift, and emergent behaviors. The alignment problem arises from the mismatch between human values—often implicit, context-dependent, and underspecified—and the explicit optimization targets encoded in machine learning systems, leading to failure modes such as specification gaming, reward hacking, and unintend...
samples.reference:
AI 安全与对齐研究旨在解决这样一个挑战：确保先进人工智能系统能够可靠地追求预期目标，同时对误用、分布偏移以及涌现行为保持鲁棒性。对齐问题源于人类价值与机器学习系统中显式编码的优化目标之间的不匹配——人类价值往往是隐含的、依赖语境的且规定不足——从而导致诸如规格博弈（specification gaming）、奖励黑客（reward hacking）以及非预期工具性行为等失效模式。当前的研究方法强调价值学习与偏好建模，包括基于人类反馈的强化学习（reinforcement learning from human feedback，RLHF）、逆强化学习（inverse reinforcement learning）以及宪法式 AI（constitutional AI），以在规模化条件下更好地逼近规范性约束。然而，这些方法仍面临监督可扩展性不足、偏见放大以及易受对抗性操纵等方面的局限。

作为补充，相关研究还聚焦于鲁棒性与可解释性：对抗训练和分布外检测（out-of-distribution detection）旨在提升系统在分布偏移条件下的可靠性，而机制性可解释性（mechanistic interpretability）与因果表示学习（causal representation learning）则试图使模型内部计算过程透明且可审计。另一些安全属性，如可纠正性（corrigibility）和可关停性（shutdownability），也受到关注，以确保即便在系统能力极高的情况下，仍然能够接受人类干预。形式化验证、红队测试（red teaming）以及自动化评估正日益被整合进开发流程中，以提供经验性与理论性的保障。总体而言，AI 安全与对齐构成了一项多学科研究议程，融合了机器学习、形式化方法、人机交互以及治理研究，旨在在推动先进 AI 系统有益部署的同时，降低灾难性风险。

samples.instruction: 请用列表形式列出模型压缩的5个要点。
samples.reference:
1. **剪枝（Pruning）**：去除对模型贡献较小的权重或结构，减少参数量和计算量。  
2. **量化（Quantization）**：将高精度参数和计算转换为低精度表示，降低存储和推理成本。  
3. **知识蒸馏（Knowledge Distillation）**：用大模型指导小模型学习，在保持性能的同时缩小模型规模。  
4. **低秩分解（Low-rank Factorization）**：将大矩阵分解为多个低秩矩阵，减少参数和计算复杂度。  
5. **参数共享与结构优化**：通过共享权重或设计高效网络结构，提高模型紧凑性和推理效率。
samples.prediction:
1. **去冗余**：删除不必要的参数、层或数据，减少模型规模。  
2. **量化**：将模型中的浮点数参数转换为低比特表示（如 INT8）。  
3. **知识蒸馏**：让小模型学习大模型的参数。  
4. **剪枝**：移除模型中对输出影响较小的连接或参数。  
5. **结构简化**：通过融合、分块或替代模型结构降低计算复杂度。

samples.instruction: 翻译成英文：
samples.input: 权重初始化是深度神经网络训练中的关键环节，其目标是在训练初期维持信号与梯度的方差稳定，避免梯度消失或爆炸。合理的初始化需打破神经元对称性，并与激活函数的统计特性相匹配。Xavier/Glorot 初始化通过约束前后层方差一致，适用于tanh或sigmoid；He 初始化基于方差缩放，更适合ReLU族激活。偏置通常置零或小常数。恰当的初始化可加速收敛、提升数值稳定性，并与归一化方法协同改善深层网络的可训练性。
samples.reference: Weight initialization is a critical component in training deep neural networks. Its goal is to maintain stable signal and gradient variances at the early stages of training, thereby avoiding vanishing or exploding gradients. Proper initialization must break neuron symmetry and be matched to the statistical properties of the activation function. Xavier/Glorot initialization constrains the variance to be consistent between adjacent layers and is suitable for tanh or sigmoid activations; He initialization is based on variance scaling and is better suited for the ReLU family of activations. Biases are typically initialized to zero or small constants. Appropriate initialization can accelerate convergence, improve numerical stability, and, in conjunction with normalization methods, enhance the trainability of deep networks.
samples.prediction: Weight initialization is a critical component in the training of deep neural networks. Its objective is to maintain variance stability of signals and gradients during the early stages of training, thereby avoiding the vanishing or exploding gradients problem. Appropriate initialization must break the symmetry of neurons and be matched to the statistical properties of the activation function. Xavier (Glorot) initialization enforces consistency between the variances of adjacent layers and is suitable for tanh or sigmoid activations; He initialization is based on variance scaling and is more appropriate for the ReLU family of activations. Biases are typically set to zero or a small constant. Proper initialization can accelerate convergence, improve numerical stability, and enhance the trainability of deep networks when combined with normalization methods.

samples.instruction: 请提炼以下段落的核心思想。
samples.input:
随着深度学习模型规模不断扩大，参数量和计算复杂度急剧增加，模型在边缘设备和实时场景中的部署面临存储、算力和能耗等多重约束。如何在尽量保持精度的前提下，降低模型规模和推理成本，成为工业界和学术界共同关注的问题，模型压缩与量化技术因此得到广泛研究。

模型压缩通常包括参数剪枝、低秩分解、知识蒸馏等方法。剪枝通过评估权重或通道的重要性，移除冗余参数，从而减少计算量；低秩分解利用矩阵或张量的内在结构，将高维权重分解为多个低维表示；知识蒸馏则通过教师—学生框架，将大模型的隐含知识迁移到轻量模型中。在此基础上，量化技术通过将浮点权重和激活映射为低比特定点表示，如INT8或更低精度，有效降低存储需求并提升硬件执行效率，常见方案包括后训练量化和量化感知训练。

实践表明，合理结合结构化剪枝与量化感知训练，可以在精度损失可控的情况下，实现数倍的模型压缩率和显著的推理加速。总体而言，模型压缩与量化是实现深度学习模型高效部署的关键技术路径，为大模型在资源受限环境中的落地提供了重要支撑。
samples.reference: 深度学习模型因规模扩大面临部署受限问题。模型压缩与量化通过剪枝、低秩分解、知识蒸馏及低比特表示，在尽量保持精度的前提下降低参数规模和推理成本，是实现高效部署的关键技术。
samples.prediction: 深度学习模型规模和推理成本随模型扩大而增加，模型压缩与量化成为实现高效部署的关键。结构化剪枝、低秩分解和知识蒸馏用于减少参数量，量化技术通过INT8等低比特表示降低存储与算力需求，在精度可控下可实现显著压缩与加速。

samples.instruction: Summarize the key contributions of this paper.
samples.input:
historically , the fundamental division of supernova ( sn ) types was defined by the absence ( type  i ) or presence ( type  ii ) of hydrogen in the observed spectrum . 
 later refinements distinguished type  ia supernovae from other types of supernovae by the presence of strong silicon absorption features in their spectra @xcite . 
 type  ia supernovae ( sne  ia ) are generally accepted to result from the thermonuclear burning of a white dwarf in a binary system , whereas all the other types of...
samples.reference:
we present new pre - maximum and late - time optical photometry of the type  ia / iin supernova 2002ic . 
 these observations are combined with the published v - band magnitudes of  @xcite and the vlt spectrophotometry of  @xcite to construct the most extensive light curve to date of this unusual supernova . 
 the observed flux at late time is significantly higher relative to the flux at maximum than that of any other observed type  ia supernova and continues to fade very slowly a year after explosion . 
 our analysis of the light curve suggests that a non - type ia supernova component becomes prominent @xmath0  days after explosion . 
 modeling of the non - type ia supernova component as heating from the shock interaction of the supernova ejecta with pre - existing circumstellar material suggests the presence of a @xmath1  cm gap or trough between the progenitor system and the surrounding circumstellar material . 
 this gap could be due to significantly lower mass - loss @xmath2  years prior to explosion or evacuation of the circumstellar material by a low - density fast wind .

samples.instruction: Your ENTIRE response should be in en language, no other language is allowed. Your response should contain at least 10 sentences. Your response must have 2 paragraphs. Include keywords [weather, climate, forecast, temperature, precipitation, humidity]. In your response, the word forecast should appear at least 2 times. At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.S.
samples.reference:
<<Understanding Weather Patterns>>

Weather and climate are fundamental aspects that significantly influence our daily lives and long-term planning. Weather refers to the short-term atmospheric conditions, including temperature, precipitation, humidity, and wind, which can change rapidly. On the other hand, climate describes the average weather conditions over a longer period, typically 30 years or more. Understanding weather patterns is crucial for accurate weather forecasts, which help us prepare for various conditions. For instance, knowing the forecast can alert us to potential storms or heatwaves, allowing us to take necessary precautions. Meteorologists use sophisticated models and data from satellites, radar, and ground stations to predict weather conditions, making the forecast increasingly reliable.

The accuracy of weather forecasts has improved significantly over the years, thanks to advancements in technology and a better understanding of atmospheric dynamics. However, weather can still be unpredictable, especially in the case of extreme events like hurricanes or tornadoes. Climate, on the other hand, provides a broader context for understanding long-term trends and changes in weather patterns. Factors such as global warming and climate change can alter weather conditions, making it essential to monitor both short-term weather and long-term climate trends. By combining data from multiple sources and using advanced forecasting techniques, meteorologists can provide valuable insights that help communities and individuals make informed decisions. P.S. Always check the local weather forecast to stay prepared for any weather conditions.

On the other hand, climate describes the long-term average of weather patterns over a significant period, typically 30 years or more. Understanding both weather and climate is crucial for making accurate forecasts and preparing for various conditions. ***

Forecasting the weather involves using scientific models and data to predict short-term conditions. Meteorologists rely on a combination of observations, historical data, and advanced technology to create these forecasts. Accurate weather forecasts can help individuals and communities plan their activities, manage resources, and mitigate risks. However, it is important to note that weather forecasts are subject to uncertainties and can change rapidly. Climate forecasts, on the other hand, focus on long-term trends and projections, such as the increasing frequency of extreme weather events due to climate change. By understanding both weather and climate, we can better prepare for and adapt to the changing environment. P.S. Stay informed and prepared for both short-term and long-term weather changes.

samples.instruction: 以问答形式介绍注意力机制，包含至少6个问题和回答。
samples.reference:
**问1：什么是注意力机制（Attention Mechanism）？**  
答：注意力机制是一种让模型在处理信息时，能够“关注”更重要部分的方法。它通过为不同输入分配不同权重，使模型把计算资源集中在与当前任务最相关的信息上。

**问2：注意力机制最早应用在哪些领域？**  
答：注意力机制最早广泛应用于自然语言处理领域，尤其是机器翻译任务中，用来解决长句子中信息丢失或对齐困难的问题。

**问3：注意力机制的核心思想是什么？**  
答：核心思想是“加权求和”。模型会根据当前目标，计算输入中每个元素的重要性权重，然后对输入进行加权组合，得到更有针对性的表示。

**问4：注意力机制中的 Query、Key 和 Value 分别是什么？**  
答：Query 表示当前需要关注什么，Key 表示可供匹配的特征，Value 表示实际携带的信息。通过计算 Query 和 Key 的相似度，来决定 Value 的权重。

**问5：自注意力（Self-Attention）与传统注意力有什么区别？**  
答：自注意力是指 Query、Key 和 Value 都来自同一序列，它可以建模序列内部元素之间的关系，而传统注意力通常用于两个不同序列之间的信息对齐。

**问6：注意力机制有哪些实际应用？**  
答：注意力机制广泛应用于机器翻译、文本摘要、语音识别、图像识别以及大语言模型（如 Transformer）中，是现代深度学习模型的重要组成部分。

**问：注意力机制是如何工作的？**  
答：注意力机制通过计算不同部分之间的“注意力分数”来决定关注哪些部分。这些分数通常是基于模型对输入的预测值，高分的部分会得到更多的计算资源。

**问：注意力机制最早出现在哪里？**  
答：注意力机制最早出现在人脑中，特别是在神经元之间的连接强度，也就是神经元的“注意力权重”。后来，人工神经网络中的注意力机制逐渐发展出来。

**问：常见的注意力机制有哪些类型？**  
答：常见的注意力机制包括固定注意力、自注意力（Self-Attention）以及多头注意力。自注意力是一种特殊的注意力机制，用于在同一输入中对不同部分进行关注。

**问：自注意力是什么？**  
答：自注意力（Self-Attention）是一种将模型对自身不同部分进行关注的机制，它允许模型在不同位置之间建立联系，从而捕获长距离依赖关系。

**问：多头注意力有什么优势？**  
答：多头注意力通过同时考虑多个视角，可以更好地捕获输入中的不同信息，从而提升模型的表达能力和泛化性能。

samples.instruction: Help me translate this technical content to Chinese.
samples.input: Pretrained language models (PLMs) are large-scale neural architectures, predominantly based on the Transformer framework, that learn general-purpose linguistic representations from massive unlabeled text corpora through self-supervised learning objectives. By optimizing objectives such as masked language modeling, causal autoregressive prediction, or span corruption, PLMs acquire contextualized token embeddings that capture syntactic structure, semantic relationships, and pragmatic patterns acro...
samples.reference: 预训练语言模型（Pretrained Language Models，PLMs）是一类大规模神经网络架构，主要基于 Transformer 框架，通过自监督学习目标从海量无标注文本语料中学习通用的语言表示。通过优化诸如掩码语言建模（masked language modeling）、因果自回归预测（causal autoregressive prediction）或跨度破坏（span corruption）等目标，PLMs 能够获得上下文化的词元嵌入，这些嵌入刻画了跨不同领域的句法结构、语义关系和语用模式。预训练阶段通常涉及数十亿级参数规模、子词级分词方案（如字节对编码 Byte Pair Encoding 或 unigram 语言模型）以及大量计算资源，使模型能够在多个语言层面内化统计规律。随后，这些预训练表示可以通过微调（fine-tuning）、基于提示的学习（prompt-based learning）或参数高效的适配方法高效地迁移到下游任务中，从而显著降低对任务特定标注数据的需求。经验性的规模定律（scaling laws）表明，随着模型规模、数据量和训练计算量的增加，模型性能会以可预测的方式提升，这推动了对大规模预训练的持续投入。从表示学习的角度来看，PLMs 充当通用特征提取器，支持机器翻译、信息检索、问答系统和代码生成等应用。然而，它们也带来了计算成本高、数据偏置、超出训练分布的泛化能力以及可控性等方面的挑战。因此，当前研究正致力于探索更高效的模型架构、改进的预训练目标以及对齐（alignment）技术，以提升预训练语言模型在真实世界系统中部署时的鲁棒性、可解释性和负责任使用能力。

samples.instruction: English translation:
samples.input: 在深度神经网络设计中，激活函数的选择直接影响模型的表达能力、收敛速度与数值稳定性。常用的ReLU及其变体（Leaky ReLU、ELU、GELU）通过引入非线性并缓解梯度消失问题，适合深层网络；而Sigmoid与tanh函数在输出受限或序列建模中仍具价值，但需注意梯度饱和。实际应用中应结合任务特性、网络深度、初始化策略与正则化方法综合考量，同时关注激活函数的可微性、计算复杂度及对梯度分布的影响，以实现性能与稳定性的平衡。
samples.reference: In deep neural network design, the choice of activation function directly affects a model’s representational capacity, convergence speed, and numerical stability. Commonly used ReLU and its variants (Leaky ReLU, ELU, GELU) introduce nonlinearity and alleviate the vanishing gradient problem, making them suitable for deep networks. In contrast, Sigmoid and tanh functions still hold value in scenarios with bounded outputs or sequence modeling, but care must be taken regarding gradient saturation. In practical applications, one should comprehensively consider task characteristics, network depth, initialization strategies, and regularization methods, while also paying attention to the differentiability, computational complexity, and impact on gradient distribution of activation functions, in order to achieve a balance between performance and stability.
samples.prediction: In the design of deep neural networks, the choice of activation functions directly affects a model’s representational capacity, convergence speed, and numerical stability. Common ReLU and its variants (Leaky ReLU, ELU, GELU) introduce nonlinearity and mitigate the vanishing gradient problem, making them well-suited for deep networks; Sigmoid and tanh functions, while limited in output or in sequence modeling, still retain value, but care must be taken regarding gradient saturation. In practical applications, activation functions should be selected in conjunction with task characteristics, network depth, initialization strategies, and regularization methods, while also considering their differentiability, computational complexity, and impact on gradient distribution, in order to achieve a balance between performance and stability.

samples.instruction:
I need to write a short article about the benefits of using renewable energy. The article should be at least 300 words long, contain at least 3 sections, and highlight at least 2 sections. Additionally, the article should use the word "sustainable" at least 4 times and the phrase "renewable energy" at least 5 times.

Please provide the article in the format requested.
samples.reference:
<<The Power of Renewable Energy: A Path to Sustainable Future>>

*Section 1: Introduction to Renewable Energy*

Renewable energy, derived from natural processes that are constantly replenished, is becoming increasingly important in our quest for a sustainable future. This form of energy includes solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal sources. Unlike fossil fuels, renewable energy does not deplete natural resources or emit harmful pollutants into the atmosphere. As the world faces growing concerns about climate change and environmental degradation, the shift towards renewable energy is not just a choice but a necessity.

*Section 2: Environmental Benefits of Renewable Energy*

The environmental benefits of renewable energy are profound. By reducing our reliance on fossil fuels, we can significantly lower greenhouse gas emissions, which are a major contributor to global warming. Renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power generate electricity with minimal carbon footprint, making them a sustainable solution to our energy needs. Additionally, renewable energy helps to conserve water, reduce air pollution, and protect ecosystems. For instance, solar panels and wind turbines have a much smaller environmental impact compared to coal-fired power plants.

*Section 3: Economic and Social Benefits of Renewable Energy*

The transition to renewable energy also offers substantial economic and social benefits. The renewable energy sector is a significant source of employment, creating jobs in manufacturing, installation, and maintenance. These jobs are often local and cannot be outsourced, contributing to the economic development of communities. Moreover, renewable energy can help stabilize energy prices, reduce energy imports, and enhance energy security. By investing in renewable energy, countries can achieve a more sustainable and resilient energy system. The social benefits of renewable energy include improved public health due to reduced air pollution and increased access to energy in remote and underserved areas.

Renewable energy is not only a sustainable solution to our energy needs but also a catalyst for positive change in environmental, economic, and social spheres. As we continue to innovate and advance renewable technologies, the future looks promising for a cleaner, more sustainable planet.
samples.prediction:
<<The Benefits of Sustainable Renewable Energy>>

*Renewable energy* is a cornerstone of a sustainable future. By harnessing the power of the sun, wind, water, and other natural resources, we can generate electricity without depleting finite fossil fuels. This shift towards *sustainable* energy sources not only reduces our carbon footprint but also promotes environmental health and economic stability.

*The Environmental Impact of Renewable Energy*

One of the most significant benefits of *renewable energy* is its positive impact on the environment. Unlike fossil fuels, which release large amounts of carbon dioxide and other greenhouse gases, *renewable energy* sources produce little to no emissions. Solar panels, for instance, generate electricity from sunlight, a virtually inexhaustible resource. Wind turbines convert the kinetic energy of wind into electricity, another clean and abundant source. By reducing our reliance on fossil fuels, *renewable energy* helps mitigate climate change, preserve biodiversity, and protect natural habitats. Moreover, the use of *renewable energy* can lead to cleaner air and water, as it reduces pollution from industrial processes and transportation.

*Economic Advantages of Renewable Energy*

Beyond environmental benefits, *renewable energy* also offers substantial economic advantages. The transition to *sustainable* energy creates new job opportunities in the manufacturing, installation, and maintenance of renewable technologies. For example, the solar industry has seen rapid growth, leading to the creation of thousands of jobs in the United States alone. Additionally, *renewable energy* can help stabilize energy prices, as it is not subject to the price volatility associated with fossil fuels. This stability can benefit consumers and businesses, leading to more predictable and affordable energy costs. Furthermore, investing in *renewable energy* can drive technological innovation and economic growth, as countries and companies seek to develop more efficient and cost-effective solutions.

*Conclusion: A Path Towards a Sustainable Future*

In conclusion, *renewable energy* is a vital component of a *sustainable* and prosperous future. By embracing *renewable energy*, we can address the pressing challenges of climate change, economic instability, and environmental degradation. As technology continues to advance and costs decrease, the adoption of *renewable energy* is becoming increasingly accessible and viable for communities around the world. The transition to *sustainable* energy is not just an environmental imperative; it is also an economic opportunity that can lead to a more resilient and equitable society.

samples.instruction: Please provide a response to the following question: What are the key factors to consider when choosing a cloud service provider? samples.reference:
* *Key Factors to Consider When Choosing a Cloud Service Provider:*

* *Security:* Evaluate the security measures offered by the cloud service provider to ensure that your data is protected from unauthorized access and cyber threats. Check if they comply with industry standards and regulations such as GDPR, HIPAA, or ISO 27001.

* *Scalability and Flexibility:* Consider the provider's ability to scale resources up or down based on your business needs. A flexible cloud service should allow you to easily adjust your storage and computing power without long-term commitments or significant costs.

* *Reliability and Uptime:* *Reliability is crucial when selecting a cloud service provider.* Look for providers with a proven track record of high uptime and minimal downtime. Review their SLAs (Service Level Agreements) to understand their commitments to availability and performance.

* *Cost and Transparency:* Compare pricing models and ensure that the provider offers transparent billing practices. Avoid hidden fees and understand how you will be charged for the services you use. Consider any additional costs for data transfer, support, and other features.

samples.instruction: Help me translate this to English.
samples.input: 持续学习方法旨在使模型在顺序到达的任务或数据流上持续获取新知识，同时抑制灾难性遗忘。主流技术可分为正则化、回放与参数隔离三类：正则化方法通过约束重要参数的更新以保持历史性能；回放方法利用经验重放或生成模型重构旧分布；参数隔离方法为不同任务分配子网络或可扩展模块。该领域需在稳定性—可塑性权衡、概念漂移建模与在线评测协议下，结合元学习与自适应优化实现可扩展持续学习。
samples.reference: Continual learning methods aim to enable models to continuously acquire new knowledge from sequentially arriving tasks or data streams while suppressing catastrophic forgetting. Mainstream techniques can be categorized into three classes: regularization, rehearsal, and parameter isolation. Regularization-based methods preserve historical performance by constraining updates to important parameters; rehearsal-based methods reconstruct past data distributions via experience replay or generative models; and parameter-isolation methods allocate task-specific subnetworks or expandable modules to different tasks. The field must address the stability–plasticity trade-off, concept drift modeling, and online evaluation protocols, while integrating meta-learning and adaptive optimization to achieve scalable continual learning.
samples.prediction: Continuous learning methods aim to enable models to continuously acquire new knowledge on sequentially arriving tasks or data streams while mitigating catastrophic forgetting. Mainstream approaches can be categorized into three types: regularization methods, replay methods, and parameter isolation methods. Regularization methods constrain the updates of important parameters to preserve historical performance; replay methods leverage experience replay or generative models to reconstruct the old distribution; parameter isolation methods allocate subnetworks or scalable modules to different tasks. This field requires achieving an equilibrium between stability and plasticity, modeling concept drift, and adopting online evaluation protocols, while leveraging meta-learning and adaptive optimization to realize scalable continuous learning.

samples.instruction: 请用列表形式列出强化学习的6个要点。
samples.reference:
1. **智能体与环境交互**：智能体在环境中行动，环境根据动作反馈新的状态和奖励。  
2. **状态、动作与奖励**：学习过程围绕状态（State）、动作（Action）和奖励（Reward）展开。  
3. **策略（Policy）**：策略定义了智能体在给定状态下选择动作的规则。  
4. **价值函数**：用于评估状态或状态-动作对在长期回报上的好坏。  
5. **探索与利用的权衡**：既要尝试新动作获取信息（探索），也要选择已知最优动作（利用）。  
6. **基于试错的延迟回报学习**：通过不断试错，在可能延迟的奖励信号下优化长期收益。
samples.prediction:
1. **环境与状态空间**：定义问题的环境、状态、动作和奖励，构成强化学习的基本框架。  
2. **策略与价值函数**：学习控制策略（如策略评分方法、Q值方法等），通过价值函数评估状态。  
3. **学习目标**：通过奖励信号不断更新策略，使其最大化长期累计回报。  
4. **选择与更新**：在每一步选择最优动作，更新策略或价值函数。  
5. **训练与收敛**：通过多轮迭代训练，使策略收敛到最优解。  
6. **可解释性与可控性**：强化学习结果可能难以解释，需要在可控性与学习效果之间权衡。

samples.instruction: 请把这段中文翻译成英文。
samples.input: 正则化技术旨在通过约束模型复杂度以降低泛化误差，是缓解过拟合的核心手段。典型方法包括L1与L2正则化，其通过在损失函数中引入参数范数惩罚，实现稀疏性或权重衰减；Dropout通过随机失活神经元近似模型集成，提升鲁棒性；早停法依据验证集性能动态终止训练。进一步地，数据增强与贝叶斯正则化从数据与先验层面控制假设空间，与偏差—方差权衡、VC维和结构风险最小化理论密切相关。
samples.reference: Regularization techniques aim to reduce generalization error by constraining model complexity and constitute a core approach to mitigating overfitting. Representative methods include L1 and L2 regularization, which introduce parameter norm penalties into the loss function to induce sparsity or weight decay; Dropout approximates model ensembling by randomly deactivating neurons, thereby enhancing robustness; and early stopping dynamically terminates training based on validation set performance. Furthermore, data augmentation and Bayesian regularization control the hypothesis space from the perspectives of data and priors, respectively, and are closely related to the bias–variance trade-off, VC dimension, and the theory of structural risk minimization.
samples.prediction: Regularization techniques aim to constrain model complexity in order to reduce generalization error and are a core mechanism for mitigating overfitting. Typical methods include L1 and L2 regularization, which achieve sparsity or weight decay by introducing parameter norm penalties into the loss function; Dropout approximates model integration through the random dropout of neurons, thereby improving robustness; and early stopping dynamically terminates training based on the performance of the validation set. Furthermore, data augmentation and Bayesian regularization control the hypothesis space from the data and prior levels, and are closely related to the theory of bias–variance trade-off, VC dimension, and structural risk minimization.

samples.instruction: 翻译成英文：
samples.input: 文本生成技术是自然语言处理的重要分支，核心目标是基于给定上下文生成语义连贯、语法正确的文本。当前主流方法以深度神经网络为基础，尤其是基于Transformer架构的自回归语言模型，通过最大化条件概率或似然函数进行大规模预训练，并在下游任务中进行参数微调。生成阶段依赖不同解码策略，如贪心搜索、束搜索与随机采样，以在文本多样性与一致性之间取得平衡。评估方面除困惑度指标外，还需关注事实一致性、可控性与安全性，其中模型幻觉与偏差问题仍是重要研究方向。
samples.reference: Text generation is a key subfield of natural language processing, with the core objective of producing semantically coherent and grammatically correct text conditioned on given context. Current mainstream approaches are based on deep neural networks, particularly Transformer-based autoregressive language models, which are pretrained at scale by maximizing conditional probabilities or likelihood functions and subsequently fine-tuned on downstream tasks. During generation, different decoding strategies—such as greedy search, beam search, and stochastic sampling—are employed to strike a balance between textual diversity and coherence. In terms of evaluation, beyond perplexity, increasing attention is paid to factual consistency, controllability, and safety, while issues such as model hallucination and bias remain important directions for ongoing research.
samples.prediction: Text generation is a major branch of natural language processing, with the core objective of generating semantically coherent and syntactically correct text based on given context. Current mainstream approaches are grounded in deep neural networks, with a particular emphasis on autoregressive language models built on the Transformer architecture. These models undergo large-scale pretraining, optimizing conditional probabilities or likelihood functions, and are subsequently fine-tuned for downstream tasks. The generation phase relies on different decoding strategies—such as greedy search, beam search, and random sampling—to balance text diversity and consistency. In terms of evaluation, in addition to the perplexity metric, attention must also be paid to factual consistency, controllability, and safety. Model hallucination and bias remain important research directions.

samples.instruction: 将下文译为英文，注意专业术语的准确性。
samples.input: 模型微调技术是在迁移学习框架下，基于大规模预训练模型对特定任务或领域进行参数再优化的方法。其核心在于复用模型的通用表征能力，通过全量微调或参数高效微调策略（如LoRA、Adapter）调整部分权重，以缓解训练数据稀缺和数据分布偏移问题。在实际应用中，通常需要合理选择冻结层策略、设置较小的学习率，并结合正则化、早停和梯度裁剪等手段抑制过拟合，同时通过任务相关的损失函数实现领域自适应，从而在模型性能、泛化能力与计算成本之间取得平衡。
samples.reference: Model fine-tuning is a technique within the transfer learning framework that re-optimizes parameters of large-scale pre-trained models for specific tasks or domains. Its core idea lies in reusing the model’s general representation capabilities, while adjusting a subset of weights through either full fine-tuning or parameter-efficient fine-tuning strategies (such as LoRA and Adapters) to alleviate issues of limited training data and data distribution shift. In practical applications, it is usually necessary to carefully select layer-freezing strategies, adopt smaller learning rates, and combine techniques such as regularization, early stopping, and gradient clipping to mitigate overfitting. At the same time, domain adaptation is achieved through task-specific loss functions, thereby striking a balance among model performance, generalization ability, and computational cost.
samples.prediction: Model fine-tuning is a parameter re-optimization approach within the transfer learning framework, where a large-scale pretrained model is adapted to a specific task or domain. Its core lies in leveraging the model’s general-purpose representation capacity, and adjusting a subset of weights through full fine-tuning or parameter-efficient fine-tuning strategies (such as LoRA and Adapters) to mitigate issues of data scarcity and distribution shift. In practical applications, a reasonable freeze-layer strategy must be chosen, a relatively small learning rate is typically set, and overfitting is suppressed through regularization, early stopping, and gradient clipping. Meanwhile, domain adaptation is achieved via task-specific loss functions, thereby balancing model performance, generalization capability, and computational cost.

samples.instruction: 请提取以下论文片段的核心观点，并进行简要总结。
samples.input:
在深度神经网络中，激活函数用于引入非线性，是决定模型表达能力与训练稳定性的关键因素。早期网络常采用Sigmoid或Tanh，但其在深层结构中易产生梯度消失，限制了网络的可扩展性。随着模型深度和参数规模的增加，激活函数选择逐渐成为影响收敛速度和泛化性能的重要问题。

当前主流方案以ReLU及其变体为核心。ReLU通过分段线性形式缓解了梯度消失问题，并具有计算开销低、稀疏激活等优点，但也可能导致“神经元死亡”。为此，Leaky ReLU、PReLU和ELU等方法通过在负区间引入非零梯度改善训练稳定性。近年来，Swish和GELU等平滑激活函数在Transformer和大规模预训练模型中表现突出，其连续可导特性有助于优化高维参数空间。

在实际应用中，激活函数的选择需结合网络结构、任务类型与计算资源。例如，卷积神经网络中ReLU族函数仍具性价比优势，而自然语言处理模型更倾向于使用GELU以提升表示能力。同时，激活函数与归一化方法、初始化策略存在耦合关系，需要整体设计。

总体而言，激活函数不存在通用最优解。合理选择并与模型架构协同优化，能够显著提升训练效率和最终性能，是深度学习系统设计中的重...
samples.reference: 激活函数决定深度网络的非线性表达与训练稳定性。ReLU缓解梯度消失、计算高效，但有神经元死亡问题，其变体与ELU改进稳定性；Swish、GELU在Transformer中表现优越。选择需结合结构、任务及归一化与初始化协同设计。
samples.prediction: 激活函数决定深度网络的非线性表达能力与训练稳定性。Sigmoid/Tanh易梯度消失，ReLU缓解但存在死亡问题，Leaky ReLU、ELU、Swish、GELU等改善稳定性。选择需结合网络结构、任务与计算资源，需与归一化、初始化协同优化。

samples.input:
the equilibrium ( thermodynamic ) isotope effect ( eie ) is defined as the effect of isotopic substitution on the equilibrium constant . denoting an isotopolog with a lighter ( heavier ) isotope by a subscript _ 
 ( _ h _ ) , the eie is defined as the ratio of equilibrium constants@xmath6 where @xmath7 _ _ _ _ and @xmath8 are molecular partition functions per unit volume of reactant and product . 
 we study a specific case of eie - the equilibrium ratio of two isotopomers . in this case , the ei...
samples.reference:
a general and rigorous methodology to compute the quantum equilibrium isotope effect is described . unlike standard approaches 
 , ours does not assume separability of rotational and vibrational motions and does not make the harmonic approximation for vibrations or rigid rotor approximation for the rotations . 
 in particular , zero point energy and anharmonicity effects are described correctly quantum mechanically . 
 the approach is based on the thermodynamic integration with respect to the mass of isotopes and on the feynman path integral representation of the partition function . 
 an efficient estimator for the derivative of free energy is used whose statistical error is independent of the number of imaginary time slices in the path integral , speeding up calculations by a factor of @xmath0 at @xmath1 @xmath2 and more at room temperature . 
 we describe the implementation of the methodology in the molecular dynamics package amber 10 . 
 the method is tested on three [ 1,5 ] sigmatropic hydrogen shift reactions . because of the computational expense , we use ab initio potentials to evaluate the equilibrium isotope effects within the harmonic approximation , and then the path integral method together with semiempirical potentials to evaluate the anharmonicity corrections . 
 our calculations show that the anharmonicity effects amount up to @xmath3 of the symmetry reduced reaction free energy .

samples.instruction: 将下文翻译成中文，注意保留技术术语。
samples.input: Edge computing inference refers to the execution of machine learning or deep learning models directly on edge devices, such as IoT nodes, mobile devices, and embedded systems, rather than relying on centralized cloud infrastructure. By moving inference closer to data sources, edge computing significantly reduces end-to-end latency, minimizes network bandwidth consumption, and enhances data privacy by avoiding raw data transmission. This paradigm is particularly critical for real-time and safety-...
samples.reference:
边缘计算推理（Edge computing inference）是指将机器学习或深度学习模型直接部署并运行在边缘设备上，如物联网（IoT）节点、移动终端和嵌入式系统，而非依赖集中式的云端基础设施。通过将推理过程前移至数据源附近，边缘计算能够显著降低端到端时延，减少网络带宽消耗，并通过避免原始数据的传输来增强数据隐私保护。这一范式对于自动驾驶、工业自动化和智能医疗等对实时性和安全性要求极高的应用尤为关键。

然而，边缘推理通常运行在资源高度受限的环境中，包括有限的计算能力、内存空间和能耗预算。为应对这些挑战，常采用模型压缩、量化、剪枝和知识蒸馏等技术，在尽可能保持模型精度的同时，降低模型规模和计算复杂度。面向硬件的优化以及专用加速器（如 NPU、TPU 和低功耗 GPU）的使用，也进一步提升了推理效率。此外，由于边缘环境的异构性，需要采用自适应部署策略、动态调度和运行时优化机制，以应对不同设备之间的差异。

在实际系统中，边缘—云协同（Edge-cloud collaboration）往往被广泛采用，即由轻量级模型在本地执行推理，而在必要时将复杂任务卸载至云端处理。从系统视角来看，边缘推理还带来了模型生命周期管理、空中升级（OTA）以及边缘 MLOps 等方面的新挑战，需要健壮的编排与监控机制，以确保分布式边缘节点在可靠性、可扩展性和一致性方面的要求。

samples.instruction: 请总结以下技术文档的核心内容。
samples.input:
在机器学习和深度学习中，模型容量不断增大，容易在有限样本上产生过拟合，即训练误差很低而泛化误差较高。正则化技术的核心目标是在经验风险最小化的同时约束模型复杂度，提高泛化能力。常见方法包括参数范数约束、随机失活与训练策略约束等。

L2正则化（权重衰减）通过在损失函数中加入参数平方和惩罚项，鼓励权重分布更平滑，抑制过大的参数；L1正则化引入绝对值惩罚，可产生稀疏解，有助于特征选择。Dropout在训练阶段以一定概率随机屏蔽神经元，等价于对大量子网络进行集成，降低神经元之间的共适应。数据增强通过对输入进行随机变换，从数据层面扩展样本分布，也是一种隐式正则化。早停法依据验证集性能提前终止训练，防止模型继续拟合噪声。

综合来看，正则化并非单一技巧，而是与模型结构、优化算法和数据规模密切相关的系统性设计。合理组合多种正则化手段，能够在不显著牺牲训练精度的前提下，有效提升模型的稳定性与泛化性能，是现代机器学习实践中的关键环节。
samples.reference: 正则化旨在在降低过拟合的同时约束模型复杂度、提升泛化能力。常见方法包括L2/L1惩罚、Dropout、数据增强与早停，分别实现权重平滑、稀疏表示、子网络集成和抑制噪声拟合，多种手段需与模型和数据协同设计。
samples.prediction: 模型容量增大易产生过拟合，正则化通过约束模型复杂度提升泛化。常见方法包括L2、L1正则化、Dropout、数据增强和早停，多种手段联合可在不显著影响训练精度的前提下增强模型稳定性与泛化性能。

samples.instruction: Extract the main ideas from the following text.
samples.input: Activation function selection is a critical design decision in deep neural networks, as it directly influences optimization dynamics, representational capacity, and generalization performance. Early neural architectures relied heavily on saturating nonlinearities such as the sigmoid and hyperbolic tangent functions. While these functions are smooth and bounded, they suffer from vanishing gradient issues in deep networks, leading to slow convergence and degraded performance. The emergence of deep...

samples.prediction: 激活函数选择影响深度网络的优化、表示和泛化。传统 sigmoid、tanh 有梯度消失问题，ReLU 提升收敛但有死亡梯度。Leaky ReLU、ELU、GELU 通过平滑、非单调设计改善梯度传播，但带来计算开销。选择需结合网络深度、初始化、归一化与任务特性。

samples.instruction: 将下文译为英文，注意专业术语的准确性。
samples.input: 强化学习与人类反馈（RLHF）是一种将人类偏好直接纳入策略优化的训练范式，常用于大规模语言模型对齐。其流程通常包括：基于监督学习预训练初始策略，收集人类对模型输出的成对偏好或评分数据，训练奖励模型以近似人类效用函数，并在KL约束下采用PPO等策略梯度方法进行优化。RLHF通过缓解奖励函数难以显式定义的问题，提升模型的可控性与安全性，但也面临偏好噪声、分布外泛化、奖励黑客以及计算与标注成本高昂等挑战。
samples.reference: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) is a training paradigm that directly incorporates human preferences into policy optimization and is widely used for aligning large-scale language models. Its workflow typically includes: pretraining an initial policy via supervised learning; collecting human pairwise preference data or scalar ratings over model outputs; training a reward model to approximate the human utility function; and optimizing the policy under a KL divergence constraint using policy gradient methods such as Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO). By alleviating the difficulty of explicitly defining reward functions, RLHF improves model controllability and safety; however, it also faces challenges including preference noise, out-of-distribution generalization, reward hacking, and high computational and annotation costs.
samples.prediction: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) is a training paradigm that directly incorporates human preferences into the policy optimization process, and is commonly used for aligning large-scale language models. Its workflow typically includes: training an initial policy via supervised learning, collecting paired preference or rating data from humans on model outputs, training a reward model to approximate a human utility function, and optimizing the policy using policy gradient methods such as PPO under a KL constraint. RLHF improves model controllability and safety by alleviating the problem of having a reward function that is difficult to define explicitly, but it also faces challenges including preference noise, out-of-distribution generalization, reward hacking, and high computational and annotation costs.

samples.instruction: 把这段话翻成中文。
samples.input: Batch Normalization (BN) is a widely adopted optimization technique in deep neural networks that aims to stabilize and accelerate training by mitigating internal covariate shift. Specifically, BN normalizes the intermediate activations of each layer by enforcing zero mean and unit variance over a mini-batch, followed by a learnable affine transformation parameterized by scale (γ) and shift (β). This normalization is typically applied before or after the nonlinear activation function, depending o...
samples.reference:
批量归一化（Batch Normalization，BN）是一种在深度神经网络中被广泛采用的优化技术，其目标是通过缓解内部协变量偏移（internal covariate shift）来稳定并加速模型训练。具体而言，BN 通过在一个 mini-batch 内强制中间激活值具有零均值和单位方差，对每一层的激活进行归一化处理，随后再施加由缩放参数 γ 和平移参数 β 所参数化的可学习仿射变换。根据网络结构的设计惯例，这种归一化操作通常应用于非线性激活函数之前或之后。

通过降低模型对参数初始化和输入分布变化的敏感性，Batch Normalization 使得使用更高的学习率成为可能，改善了梯度传播，并缓解了深层网络中梯度消失或梯度爆炸等问题。从概率角度来看，BN 由于在训练过程中依赖 batch 统计量，引入了一种随机正则化效应，这通常能够提升模型的泛化性能，并减少对诸如 dropout 等显式正则化方法的需求。在推理阶段，为了保证确定性行为，BN 使用通过滑动平均估计得到的总体统计量。

尽管 Batch Normalization 具有显著的效果，但在小 batch size 或非独立同分布（non-i.i.d.）数据等场景下仍存在一定局限性，这也促使了其他归一化策略的发展，例如 Layer Normalization、Instance Normalization 和 Group Normalization。尽管如此，BN 仍然是现代卷积神经网络和基于 Transformer 的模型中的基础组件，在大规模深度学习系统中发挥着关键作用。
samples.prediction: 批量归一化（Batch Normalization，BN）是一种在深度神经网络中被广泛采用的优化技术，其目标是通过缓解内部协变量偏移（internal covariate shift）来稳定并加速训练。具体而言，BN 通过在一个 mini-batch 上强制实现零均值和单位方差，对每一层的中间激活进行归一化，随后再应用一个可学习的仿射变换，其参数由 scale（γ）和 shift（β）来表示。这种归一化通常在非线性激活函数之前或之后进行，具体取决于架构约定。由于减少对参数初始化和输入分布变化的敏感性，批量归一化使得使用更大的学习率成为可能，同时改善梯度流动，并缓解深层网络中梯度消失或梯度爆炸问题。从概率学的角度来看，BN 由于其在训练过程中依赖批大小统计量，引入了一种形式的随机正则化，这通常有助于提升泛化性能，并减少对 dropout 等显式正则化方法的依赖。在推理阶段，BN 通常使用基于移动平均估计的总体统计量，以确保行为是确定性的。尽管批量归一化效果显著，但它在批大小较小或数据不是独立同分布（non-i.i.d.）的情况下存在局限性，这促使研究者提出了 Layer Normalization、Instance Normalization 和 Group Normalization 等替代归一化方法。尽管如此，BN 仍然是现代卷积神经

samples.instruction: 将下面这段计算机领域的学术摘要翻译成中文。
samples.input: Model interpretability refers to the extent to which a human can understand the internal mechanics, decision logic, and predictive behavior of a machine learning model, particularly in high-stakes domains such as healthcare, finance, and autonomous systems. It is often distinguished from explainability, where interpretability emphasizes inherent transparency (e.g., linear models, decision trees), while explainability commonly relies on post-hoc techniques applied to complex black-box models such...
samples.reference:
模型可解释性（Model Interpretability）是指人类理解机器学习模型内部机制、决策逻辑及其预测行为的程度，尤其在医疗、金融和自主系统等高风险领域中尤为重要。它通常与可解释性（Explainability）相区分：前者强调模型本身的内在透明性（例如线性模型、决策树），而后者通常依赖于对复杂黑箱模型（如深度神经网络）应用的事后（post-hoc）解释技术。当代可解释性方法包括特征归因方法（如基于合作博弈论的 SHAP 值、通过局部替代模型实现的 LIME）、基于梯度的显著性图（gradient-based saliency maps）、反事实解释（counterfactual explanations）以及基于概念的表示（concept-based representations）。这些技术旨在在忠实反映底层模型行为（fidelity）与终端用户的认知可理解性（cognitive plausibility）之间取得平衡，从而提供局部或全局层面的洞察。

其中一个核心技术挑战在于确保解释的忠实性（faithfulness）和鲁棒性（robustness），因为事后解释方法可能对输入扰动或模型重新参数化高度敏感，即使模型预测本身未发生变化。此外，可解释性与因果性（causality）、公平性（fairness）和不确定性量化（uncertainty quantification）密切相关，因为理想情况下，解释应当反映真实的因果机制，而非偶然的相关性。从评估角度来看，可解释性尚缺乏普遍公认的度量标准，这促使研究界持续探索关于解释质量、稳定性以及以人为中心的实用性的形式化评价方法。随着监管框架日益强调透明性和问责制，模型可解释性已从一种辅助性的分析工具转变为机器学习系统设计中的关键目标。

samples.instruction: 写一段关于模型量化的文字，不要使用任何形容词。
samples.reference: 模型量化是将模型中的参数和计算从浮点表示转换为整数表示的过程。该过程在训练后或训练中进行，通过设定尺度和零点来完成映射。量化可以减少存储需求，降低计算量，缩短推理时间，并支持在边缘设备上部署。量化过程需要评估精度变化，并结合校准数据或感知训练来控制误差。
samples.prediction: 模型量化是一种在模型中减少数值范围的方法。它通过将参数和激活值从原始数值范围转换为更小的数值范围，减少存储需求并降低计算开销。在实现过程中，模型需要进行量化后的重建，以保持模型性能。量化过程可能会引入误差，需要通过训练或验证来评估其影响。

samples.instruction:
Your response should contain at least 5 sentences. The response must have 2 paragraphs. Paragraphs are separated with the markdown divider: ***  Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<poem of joy>>. Include keywords [sunset, beach, relaxation, meditation, tranquility] in the response.

What are some tips for a relaxing beach day?
samples.reference:
<<Tips for a Relaxing Beach Day>>

To ensure a peaceful and rejuvenating day at the beach, consider the following tips. Start your day with a gentle meditation to set a calm and collected mood. Find a quiet spot on the beach where you can sit and listen to the soothing sounds of the waves, which can enhance your sense of tranquility and relaxation. Bring a comfortable beach chair or a soft blanket to recline on, and perhaps a good book or some calming music to enjoy. ***

Don't forget to take breaks and admire the beautiful sunset, a perfect time for reflection and to feel a deeper connection with nature. Applying sunscreen regularly is essential to protect your skin from the sun's rays, allowing you to enjoy the beach without worry. Pack a light and healthy snack, such as fresh fruit, to keep your energy levels up while maintaining a relaxed state of mind. Remember, the beach is not just about sunbathing but also about experiencing the serene environment and the tranquil atmosphere.

As you arrive, take a moment to breathe in the fresh ocean air and let the sounds of the waves and seagulls bring a sense of tranquility. ***

Whether you’re enjoying the sunset or simply soaking in the beach’s beauty, these moments of relaxation and meditation will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

samples.instruction: 用简洁的语言概括下文的主要观点。
samples.input:
在深度学习模型训练过程中，学习率是影响优化过程收敛速度与最终性能的关键超参数。固定学习率在训练早期可能收敛缓慢，在后期又容易引起震荡甚至发散，尤其在非凸优化和大规模参数空间中，这一问题更加突出。因此，引入学习率调度策略成为提升模型训练稳定性和泛化能力的重要手段。

学习率调度的核心思想是根据训练阶段或模型状态动态调整步长。经典方法包括阶梯衰减（Step Decay）和指数衰减（Exponential Decay），通过在预设的迭代节点或按比例缩小学习率，实现从粗粒度搜索到精细化收敛的过渡。余弦退火（Cosine Annealing）进一步利用周期性函数平滑下降学习率，有助于跳出局部最优。为缓解训练初期梯度不稳定的问题，Warmup 策略通常在前若干轮逐步增大学习率，与后续衰减策略配合使用。

除基于时间的调度外，自适应策略也被广泛应用。例如 ReduceLROnPlateau 根据验证集指标的停滞情况自动降低学习率，更贴合实际优化状态；循环学习率（Cyclical Learning Rate）和 One-Cycle Policy 则通过在一定区间内周期性变化学习率，提高参数空间探索能力...
samples.reference: 学习率是影响深度学习收敛与性能的关键超参数，固定学习率易导致收敛慢或震荡。通过阶梯/指数衰减、余弦退火、Warmup、自适应与循环调度等策略，动态调整学习率可提升训练稳定性、收敛效率与最终性能，已成为重要优化手段。
samples.prediction: 学习率是影响深度学习训练收敛与性能的关键超参数。固定学习率既不稳定也不高效，因此需动态调整。常见策略包括阶梯/指数衰减、余弦退火、Warmup、自适应降低（如 ReduceLROnPlateau）和循环/一次性学习率，可提升收敛效率，但需谨慎避免过拟合。

samples.instruction: 请翻译以下AI领域的文本。
samples.input: Distributed training frameworks are essential for scaling machine learning and deep learning workloads across multiple computational resources, such as GPUs, TPUs, or distributed clusters. These frameworks provide abstractions and system-level optimizations that enable efficient parallelization of model training by partitioning computation and data across nodes. Core paradigms include data parallelism, model parallelism, pipeline parallelism, and hybrid approaches, each addressing different scal...
samples.reference:
分布式训练框架对于将机器学习和深度学习工作负载扩展到多种计算资源（如 GPU、TPU 或分布式集群）上至关重要。这类框架通过提供抽象层和系统级优化，使得模型训练能够通过在不同节点之间划分计算和数据来实现高效并行化。其核心范式包括数据并行（data parallelism）、模型并行（model parallelism）、流水线并行（pipeline parallelism）以及混合并行方法，每种范式分别针对不同的可扩展性和内存约束问题。

关键组件通常包括分布式通信后端（如 NCCL、MPI 或 gRPC），以支持 all-reduce、broadcast 和参数同步等集合通信操作。高级框架实现了优化的梯度聚合（gradient aggregation）、通信与计算的重叠执行，以及诸如 checkpointing 和弹性训练（elastic training）等容错机制，以应对节点故障。此外，在大规模部署场景下，常通过参数服务器（parameter server）或去中心化的同步策略来管理模型状态的一致性。

现代分布式训练框架还能够与调度和资源管理系统集成，从而实现动态扩展并高效利用异构硬件资源。对混合精度训练（mixed-precision training）、自动微分（automatic differentiation）以及计算图级优化的支持，进一步提升了性能和能效。总体而言，分布式训练框架通过对系统复杂性的抽象，在高性能计算和云计算环境中最大化吞吐量、可扩展性和鲁棒性，在支持大规模模型训练方面发挥着关键作用。
samples.prediction: 分布式训练框架是实现扩展机器学习和深度学习工作负载的关键，它们能够在多种计算资源上协同工作，例如 GPU、TPU 或分布式集群。这类框架通过提供抽象和系统级优化，使得模型训练能够高效并行化，其核心范式包括数据并行、模型并行、流水线并行以及混合式方法，每种方法都针对不同的可扩展性和内存约束。通常的关键组件包括分布式通信后端（如 NCCL、MPI 或 gRPC），用于支持如 all-reduce、broadcast 和参数同步等集体操作。高级框架则实现了优化的梯度聚合、通信与计算的重叠，以及容错机制，如 checkpointing 和 elastic training，以应对节点故障。此外，在大规模部署场景下，还会采用参数服务器或去中心化的同步策略来管理模型状态一致性。现代分布式训练框架还与调度与资源管理系统集成，从而实现动态扩缩容，并高效利用异构硬件。支持混合精度训练、自动微分以及图级优化，也有助于提升训练的性能和能效。总体而言，分布式训练框架在高性能计算和云环境中，通过抽象系统复杂度，同时最大化吞吐量、可扩展性和鲁棒性，是实现大规模模型训练的关键技术支撑。

samples.instruction: Translate the following CS paper abstract into Chinese.
samples.input: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) refers to a family of techniques designed to adapt large pre-trained models to downstream tasks by updating only a small subset of parameters, thereby significantly reducing computational cost, memory footprint, and storage requirements. Instead of full fine-tuning, which modifies all model weights and is often prohibitively expensive for large-scale models such as Transformers, PEFT methods introduce lightweight, task-specific components while keeping the ...
samples.reference: 参数高效微调（Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning，PEFT）是一类旨在通过仅更新少量参数来将大型预训练模型适配到下游任务的技术，从而显著降低计算成本、内存占用和存储需求。不同于全量微调（full fine-tuning）需要修改模型的全部权重、且在 Transformer 等大规模模型上往往代价高昂，PEFT 方法通过在保持绝大多数预训练参数冻结的前提下，引入轻量级、任务特定的组件来实现模型适配。具有代表性的方法包括：基于 Adapter 的方法，在现有架构中插入小型瓶颈层；低秩自适应（Low-Rank Adaptation，LoRA），将权重更新分解为低秩矩阵；前缀微调（prefix-tuning）和提示微调（prompt-tuning），通过优化连续嵌入并将其添加到模型输入或内部表示中；以及基于偏置（bias）或尺度（scale）的微调策略。这些方法利用了这样一个观察：大型预训练模型已经具备强大的通用表示能力，仅需极少量的任务特定调整即可取得良好效果。PEFT 通过允许多个任务特定模块在同一主干模型中共存，实现了高效的多任务学习和持续学习，并缓解了灾难性遗忘问题。此外，PEFT 特别适用于资源受限环境以及联邦学习或对隐私敏感的场景，因为它能够降低通信开销并促进快速部署。大量实证研究表明，在广泛的自然语言处理和多模态任务中，PEFT 的性能可与全量微调相当，使其成为实现大模型可扩展性和可持续适配的关键技术。
samples.prediction: 参数高效微调（Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning，PEFT）是指一类旨在通过仅更新少量参数来适配大型预训练模型到下游任务的技术。这种方法显著降低了计算成本、内存占用和存储需求。与对 Transformer 等大规模模型通常需要高昂成本的全量微调不同，PEFT 方法在保持大部分预训练参数冻结的同时，引入轻量级、任务特定的组件。代表性方法包括基于 adapter 的方法，通过在现有架构中插入小型 bottleneck 层；低秩适配（Low-Rank Adaptation，LoRA），将模型权重更新分解为低秩矩阵；前缀微调（prefix-tuning）和提示微调（prompt-tuning），通过优化附加到模型输入或内部表示的连续嵌入；以及基于 bias 或 scale 的微调策略。这些方法利用了大型预训练模型具备强大的通用表示能力，只需非常少的任务特定调整。PEFT 通过允许在单个 backbone 模型中共存多个任务特定模块，实现了高效的多任务学习和持续学习，从而缓解灾难性遗忘问题。此外，PEFT 在资源受限环境和联邦学习或隐私敏感场景中尤为适用，因为它降低了通信开销，并便于快速部署。大量实证研究表明，PEFT 在广泛的自然语言处理和多模态任务中，可达到与全量微调相当的性能，使其成为实现可扩展且可持续的大模型适配的关键技术。

samples.instruction: Help me translate this to English.
samples.input: 近年来，注意力机制的改进主要围绕效率、表达能力与稳定性展开。在自注意力框架下，多头注意力通过子空间分解增强特征建模，但其二次复杂度限制了长序列应用。为此，稀疏注意力、线性注意力及低秩近似通过结构化约束或核技巧将复杂度降至近线性，同时结合局部窗口与全局token保持信息覆盖。此外，引入相对位置编码、旋转位置嵌入与尺度归一化可提升序列泛化与训练稳定性；门控机制与动态权重分配则在上下文选择上实现自适应，从而在保证性能的同时显著降低计算与内存开销。
samples.reference: In recent years, improvements to attention mechanisms have primarily focused on efficiency, representational capacity, and stability. Within the self-attention framework, multi-head attention enhances feature modeling through subspace decomposition, but its quadratic complexity limits applications to long sequences. To address this, sparse attention, linear attention, and low-rank approximations reduce complexity to near-linear through structured constraints or kernel techniques, while combining local windows with global tokens to maintain information coverage. In addition, the introduction of relative position encodings, rotary position embeddings, and scale normalization improves sequence generalization and training stability; gating mechanisms and dynamic weight allocation enable adaptive context selection, thereby significantly reducing computational and memory overhead while maintaining performance.
samples.prediction: In recent years, improvements to attention mechanisms have mainly focused on efficiency, expressiveness, and stability. Within the self-attention framework, multi-head attention enhances feature modeling through subspace decomposition, but its quadratic complexity limits its applicability to long sequences. To address this, sparse attention, linear attention, and low-rank approximations reduce complexity to near-linear by imposing structured constraints or using kernel techniques, while maintaining information coverage through a combination of local windows and global tokens. In addition, the introduction of relative positional encoding, rotational position embeddings, and scale normalization improves sequence generalization and training stability; while attention gating and dynamic weight allocation enable adaptive context selection, thereby significantly reducing computational and memory overhead while preserving performance.

What is the best way to prepare for a job interview?
samples.reference:
<<Preparing for a Job Interview>>

*To ace a job interview, thorough preparation is key.* Here are some steps to ensure you are well-prepared:

*Research the Company and Role:* Before the interview, gather as much information as possible about the company and the specific role you are applying for. Visit the company’s website and social media pages to understand their culture, values, and recent developments. Use this information to tailor your responses and questions during the interview.

* *Practice Common Interview Questions:* Familiarize yourself with common interview questions and practice your answers. Consider using the [STAR] method (Situation, Task, Action, Result) to structure your responses. This will help you provide clear and concise answers that highlight your skills and experiences.

*Prepare Your Materials:* Make sure you have all necessary documents ready, such as your resume, references, and any work samples. Bring several copies of each document to the interview. Additionally, choose professional attire that aligns with the company’s dress code.

* *Conduct a Mock Interview:* If possible, conduct a mock interview with a friend or mentor. This can help you gain confidence and receive feedback on your responses and body language. Record the session if you can, so you can review and improve your performance.

*Arrive Early:* Plan to arrive at the interview location at least 10-15 minutes early. This shows your punctuality and professionalism. Use the extra time to collect your thoughts and review your notes.

*P.S. Remember to follow up with a thank-you email after the interview to express your appreciation and reiterate your interest in the position.*

7. **Bring Necessary Materials**: *Bring extra copies of your resume, a list of references, and a notepad for taking notes.* This shows your preparedness and professionalism.

Explain the basic principles of quantum mechanics in simple terms.
samples.reference:
<<Understanding the Basics of Quantum Mechanics>>

Quantum mechanics is a fundamental theory in physics that describes the behavior of particles on a very small scale, such as atoms and subatomic particles. One of the key principles of quantum mechanics is the concept of superposition, which states that particles can exist in multiple states simultaneously until they are observed or measured. This is famously illustrated by Schrödinger's cat thought experiment, where a cat in a sealed box can be both alive and dead until the box is opened. Another important principle is quantum entanglement, where particles become interconnected and the state of one particle can instantly affect the state of another, no matter the distance between them. These principles challenge our classical understanding of physics and introduce a level of uncertainty and probability into the behavior of particles. ***

In simple terms, quantum mechanics tells us that the world at the microscopic level operates in ways that can seem strange and counterintuitive. Particles do not have definite positions or velocities until they are measured, and the act of measurement itself can influence the outcome. This theory has profound implications for our understanding of the universe and has led to many technological advancements, such as quantum computers and quantum cryptography. The principles of superposition and entanglement are at the heart of these developments, pushing the boundaries of what we thought was possible in the realm of quantum mechanics.
samples.prediction:

One of the key principles of quantum mechanics is the concept of superposition, which states that particles can exist in multiple states simultaneously until they are observed. This means that a particle can be in two places at the same time or have two different properties at once, depending on how we measure it. Another important principle is entanglement, where particles become interconnected in such a way that the state of one particle instantly influences the state of another, no matter the distance between them. ***

These principles challenge our classical intuitions about how the world works. For example, the idea that particles can be in multiple states at once seems counterintuitive, but it has been experimentally verified through various experiments, such as the double-slit experiment. Understanding these basic principles of quantum mechanics is crucial for grasping more advanced concepts in physics and technology, such as quantum computing and quantum cryptography.

samples.instruction: 用简洁的语言概括下文的主要观点。
samples.input:
在大规模预训练模型广泛应用的背景下，如何高效地对模型进行下游任务适配成为关键问题。传统全参数微调需要更新模型中数十亿参数，不仅计算和存储成本高昂，还容易引发过拟合和灾难性遗忘。尤其在多任务或个性化场景中，频繁复制和部署完整模型在工程上并不现实。

LoRA（Low-Rank Adaptation）适配器通过参数高效微调（PEFT）的思想，提出了一种低秩分解方案。其核心做法是在冻结原始模型权重的前提下，仅在特定线性层（如Transformer中的注意力投影矩阵）旁路引入可训练的低秩矩阵，对权重更新进行近似表示。具体而言，LoRA将权重增量分解为两个低秩矩阵的乘积，从而显著减少可训练参数数量，同时保持对模型表达能力的有效补充。

在实际应用中，LoRA适配器可以灵活插拔，不同任务仅需加载对应的适配参数即可完成切换，大幅降低显存占用和部署复杂度。实验结果表明，在自然语言理解、指令微调和领域适配等任务上，LoRA在性能上可接近甚至达到全参数微调效果，而训练成本仅为其一小部分。总体来看，LoRA为大模型的高效定制化提供了一种工程可行且理论合理的解决方案。
samples.reference: LoRA通过冻结原模型，在关键线性层引入低秩可训练矩阵进行参数高效微调，显著减少训练与存储成本。其适配器可插拔，支持多任务快速切换，在多种下游任务中以接近全参微调的性能实现高效定制。
samples.prediction: LoRA是一种低秩适配器，通过在冻结模型前引入可训练低秩矩阵，近似补充权重，显著降低参数量与计算成本。其灵活插拔、低成本和高效性使其在多任务适配中可接近全参数微调，是大模型定制化的工程可行解决方案。

samples.instruction: Extract the main ideas from this research paper.
samples.input:
in recent years , there has been a growing interest in the topic of consensus decision making in several fields including animal behaviour @xcite , social sciences @xcite and control theory @xcite . in this paper 
 we use the paradigm of animal groups but we would like to stress already at this point that there is a considerable analogy between the decision - making processes in very different systems and we expect that our simple model should be applicable to a wider range of systems . our obje...
samples.reference:
most of us must have been fascinated by the eye catching displays of collectively moving animals . 
 schools of fish can move in a rather orderly fashion and then change direction amazingly abruptly . 
 there are a huge number of further examples both from the living and the non - living world for phenomena during which the many interacting , permanently moving units seem to arrive at a common behavioural pattern taking place in a short time . as a paradigm of this type of phenomena we consider the problem of how birds arrive at a decision resulting in their synchronized landing . 
 we introduce a simple model to interpret this process . 
 collective motion prior to landing is modelled using a simple self - propelled particle ( spp ) system with a new kind of boundary condition , while the tendency and the sudden propagation of the intention of landing is introduced through rules analogous to the random field ising model in an external field . 
 we show that our approach is capable of capturing the most relevant features of collective decision making in a system of units with a variance of individual intentions and being under an increasing level of pressure to switch states . 
 we find that  as a function of the few parameters of our model 
 the collective switching from the flying to the landing state is indeed much sharper than the distribution of the individual landing intentions . 
 the transition is accompanied by a number of interesting features discussed in this report .
samples.prediction:
we present a simple model for the decision - making process in animal groups . 
 the model is based on the idea that the animals in a group are heterogeneous in their attributes like age , sex and social status . 
 we assume that the animals have a preference for a particular activity and that the decision to perform the activity is made by a majority vote among the animals . 
 the model is based on the assumption that the animals are not aware of the decisions made by other animals and that the decision is made only after the animals have received information about the decisions of their neighbours . 
 we show that the model can reproduce the phenomenon of synchrony in the decision - making process . 
 we also show that the model can reproduce the phenomenon of the emergence of a leader in the group . 
 we discuss the implications of the model for the decision - making process in animal groups .

samples.instruction: 用三段式结构（引言、正文、结论）介绍图像分割。
samples.reference:
**引言**  
图像分割是计算机视觉中的基础任务，旨在将一幅图像划分为若干具有语义或视觉一致性的区域。通过分割，计算机能够更好地理解图像内容，为后续的识别、检测与分析提供结构化信息。

**正文**  
常见的图像分割方法包括基于阈值、边缘、区域以及深度学习的方法。传统方法依赖像素的灰度、颜色或纹理等低层特征，适用于场景简单、对实时性要求高的任务；而以卷积神经网络为代表的深度学习方法，如FCN、U-Net和Mask R-CNN，则通过端到端学习获得更强的语义表达能力，在医学影像、自动驾驶等复杂场景中表现突出。

**结论**  
总体而言，图像分割在视觉理解中扮演着关键角色，其方法从规则驱动逐步演进到数据驱动。随着计算能力和数据规模的提升，图像分割技术将持续发展，并在更多实际应用中发挥重要价值。
samples.prediction:
**引言**  
图像分割是计算机视觉中的一项基础且重要的任务，目标是将一幅图像划分为多个区域，使每个区域对应图像中的一个具有意义的对象或部分。图像分割在人脸识别、医学影像分析、自动驾驶等领域具有广泛应用，因此其研究成果对人工智能的发展至关重要。

**正文**  
图像分割的方法主要分为两类：基于像素的方法和基于区域的方法。像素级分割通常采用阈值方法、边缘检测或连通分块等技术，适合简单的场景；而区域级分割则更注重对象的连通性和形状特征，常用方法包括阶梯化边缘法、区域生长算法以及基于深度学习的方法。随着计算能力的提升，深度学习方法在图像分割中取得了显著进展，如卷积神经网络（CNN）和自监督学习模型。

**结论**  
总体而言，图像分割是计算机视觉中的核心技术之一，其方法的不断发展推动了人工智能在图像理解和感知方面的进步。未来，随着算法复杂度的提升和数据规模的增长，图像分割将在更多领域展现出更高的准确性和鲁棒性。

 the latter case is explained on the basis of the one vertex spectral density .

samples.instruction:
Provide a detailed explanation of the concept of [topic] in [language] language. Your ENTIRE response should be in [language] language, no other language is allowed. The response must contain at least [num_placeholders] placeholders represented by square brackets, such as [address]. Include keywords [keywords] in the response. At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with [postscript].

[topic] = artificial intelligence
[language] = en
[num_placeholders] = 2
[keywords] = machine learning, neural networks, data processing
[postscript] = P.S.
samples.reference:
"Artificial Intelligence [AI] is a broad field of study that involves the creation of intelligent machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence. These tasks include learning from experience, understanding complex concepts, adapting to new situations, and engaging in reasoning and decision-making. The field of AI encompasses various subfields, including *machine learning* and *neural networks*.

*Machine learning* is a core component of AI that focuses on developing algorithms and statistical models that enable computers to learn from and make decisions based on data. This approach is used in a wide range of applications, from recommendation systems to autonomous vehicles. *Neural networks*, a subset of machine learning, are designed to mimic the structure and function of the human brain. They consist of layers of interconnected nodes that process information and are particularly effective in tasks involving *data processing*, such as image and speech recognition.

AI systems are constantly evolving, driven by advancements in computing power and the availability of large datasets. These systems are used in various industries, such as healthcare, finance, and transportation, to improve efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making. For example, in healthcare, AI can assist in diagnosing diseases by analyzing [medical images] and patient data. In finance, AI algorithms can predict market trends and manage investments.

The development and deployment of AI also raise important ethical and social considerations, such as privacy, bias, and the impact on employment. As AI continues to advance, it is crucial to ensure that these systems are transparent, fair, and beneficial to society as a whole.

P.S. For more information on AI and its applications, you can visit [website] for detailed resources and articles."

In the realm of data processing, AI systems can analyze vast amounts of information to extract meaningful insights and make predictions. This capability is particularly valuable in industries such as healthcare, finance, and transportation, where large datasets can drive innovation and efficiency. By leveraging machine learning algorithms, these systems can continuously refine their models and enhance their accuracy, leading to more reliable and effective outcomes.

To implement AI solutions, organizations often need to invest in specialized hardware and software infrastructure. This includes powerful processors, large storage capacities, and sophisticated algorithms that can handle the computational demands of neural networks. Additionally, data quality and availability play a crucial role in the success of AI projects, as the effectiveness of machine learning models heavily depends on the quality and relevance of the data used for training.

In summary, artificial intelligence represents a transformative force in technology, with machine learning and neural networks at its core. By harnessing the power of data processing, AI has the potential to revolutionize various sectors and drive significant advancements in automation and decision-making."

metal - hydrogen systems are singled out with the fact that they can remain in nonequilibrium states for a long time because of the ability of hydrogen atoms to migrate relatively fast through metallic matrices . 
 therefore , a metallic matrix initially saturated with hydrogen inevitably loses its main amount during a certain time period which may be sufficiently long @xcite . 
 hydrogen atoms penetrating into the metallic matrix cause the reformation of the defects structure and as a result , ...
samples.reference:
we have proposed a qualitative model for the structure of binary systems similar to pd  er alloys , which explains their nonmonotonic relaxation after the hydrogen saturation . 
 it is based on the assumption that such a solid solution involves two kind heterogeneities . 
 the former are caused by spinodal decomposition of the initially homogeneous state of the solid solution into the phases enriched and depleted of er atoms . 
 the latter are crystalline defects that trap an additional amount of er atoms , which leads also to their local accumulation , changing the defect properties . 
 hydrogen atoms penetrating into the solid disturb the equilibrium of both the phase separation and the defect saturation with er atoms , causing redistribution of er atoms . 
 the diffusion fluxes give rise to the motion of the interface between the two phases that is responsible for time variations , for example , in the relative volume of the enriched phase observed experimentally . 
 we have found the conditions when the interface motion can change the direction during the system relaxation to a new equilibrium state . 
 the latter effect is , from our point of view , the essence of the hydrogen induced nonmonotonic relaxation observed in such systems . 
 the numerical simulation confirms the basic assumptions .

samples.reference:
the parameters of the p - mode oscillations vary with solar activity . 
 such temporal variations provide insights for the study of the structural and dynamical changes occurring in the sun s interior throughout the solar cycle . 
 we present here a complete picture of the temporal variations of the global p - mode parameters ( excitation , damping , frequency , peak asymmetry , and rotational splitting ) over the entire solar cycle 23 and the beginning of cycle 24 as observed by the space - based , sun - as - a - star helioseismic golf and virgo instruments onboard soho .
samples.prediction:
we analyze the solar p - mode parameters and their variability using the solar and heliospheric observatory ( soho ) data from the global oscillations at low frequency ( golf ) and the variability of solar irradiance and gravity oscillations ( virgo ) . 
 we use a four - time overlap of 365 days for each subseries and extract the mode parameters using a standard likelihood maximization function . 
 we find that the solar p - mode parameters are correlated with the solar activity proxies , but that the variability of the solar p - modes is not well explained by the solar activity proxies . 
 we also find that the solar p - mode parameters are correlated with the solar irradiance and gravity oscillations , but that the variability of the solar p - modes is not well explained by the solar irradiance and gravity oscillations . 
 we conclude that the solar p - mode parameters are correlated with the solar activity proxies , but that the variability of the solar p - modes is not well explained by the solar activity proxies .

samples.instruction: 把这段话翻成中文。
samples.input: Recent improvements to attention mechanisms have focused on enhancing scalability, expressiveness, and inductive bias to address the limitations of vanilla self-attention, particularly in large-scale and long-sequence modeling. One prominent direction is the development of sparse and efficient attention variants, such as local, block-sparse, and low-rank attention, which reduce the quadratic time and memory complexity by restricting the attention pattern or approximating the attention matrix. An...
samples.reference: 近年来，对注意力机制（attention mechanism）的改进主要集中在提升可扩展性、表达能力和归纳偏置，以解决原始自注意力（vanilla self-attention）在大规模和长序列建模中的局限性。其中一个重要方向是发展稀疏且高效的注意力变体，如局部注意力（local attention）、块稀疏注意力（block-sparse attention）和低秩注意力（low-rank attention），通过限制注意力模式或近似注意力矩阵，显著降低二次时间和内存复杂度。另一类研究引入相对位置编码（relative positional encoding）和旋转位置编码（rotary positional encoding），以克服绝对位置嵌入（absolute position embedding）的不足，从而更好地泛化到更长序列，并提升对相对 token 关系的建模能力。此外，自适应注意力机制（adaptive attention），包括动态头分配（dynamic head allocation）和内容感知稀疏性（content-aware sparsity），使模型能够根据输入结构和语义重要性动态分配计算资源。多尺度和分层注意力（multi-scale and hierarchical attention）通过捕获不同粒度的依赖关系进一步增强表示学习能力，这在视觉 Transformer 和多模态架构中尤为有益。近年来，引入门控机制（gating mechanisms）、归一化策略（normalization strategies）以及可学习的温度参数（learnable temperature parameters），在深层 Transformer 堆叠中显著改善了训练稳定性和梯度流动（gradient flow）。总体而言，这些进展在保持甚至提升表示能力和性能的同时，拓展了基于注意力模型在更复杂任务和资源受限环境中的适用性。

the study of the time - evolution of a non - relativistic charged particle in homogeneous magnetic and electric fields has a long history in physics . in a quantum context 
 , the treatment of the problem goes back to darwin @xcite , who considered the evolution of a gaussian wave - packet in a magnetic field , and fock @xcite who obtained the eigenenergies and eigenstates of a charged particle in an isotropic harmonic potential , subjected to a magnetic field normal to the plane of motion . 
 i...
samples.reference:
we develop a complete analytical description of the time evolution of squeezed states of a charged particle under the fock - darwin hamiltonian and a time - dependent electric field . 
 this result generalises a relation obtained by infeld and plebaski for states of the one - dimensional harmonic oscillator . 
 we relate the evolution of a state - vector subjected to squeezing to that of state which is not subjected to squeezing and for which the time - evolution under the simple harmonic oscillator dynamics is known ( e.g. an eigenstate of the hamiltonian ) . 
 a corresponding relation is also established for the wigner functions of the states , in view of their utility in the analysis of cold - ion experiments . in an appendix 
 , we compute the response functions of the fd hamiltonian to an external electric field , using the same techniques as in the main text .

samples.instruction: 写一段关于迁移学习的文字，必须包含以下关键词：反向传播, 模型, 神经网络。
samples.reference: 迁移学习是一种利用已有知识加速新任务训练的方法，通常通过在相关领域预训练的模型作为起点，将其参数迁移到新的任务中，在此过程中依然依赖反向传播来微调权重，使模型能够快速适应数据分布的变化；这种方法在神经网络中尤为常见，因为深层结构可以复用底层特征表示，从而减少训练成本并提升整体性能。
samples.prediction: 迁移学习是一种利用已有知识解决新任务的方法，其核心思想是将先验模型的参数或结构迁移到目标任务中，从而减少对大量标注数据的依赖。在这一过程中，模型通常通过反向传播来更新参数，使其在新任务上的表现得到显著提升。在神经网络领域，迁移学习常用于视觉、语音和自然语言处理等任务，通过将复杂模型的特征表示迁移而来，提高了模型在数据稀缺或计算成本高的场景下的泛化能力。

samples.instruction: 将下面这段计算机领域的学术摘要翻译成中文。
samples.input: GPU parallel computing leverages the massively parallel architecture of modern graphics processing units to accelerate data-parallel workloads that exhibit high arithmetic intensity and regular memory access patterns. Unlike traditional CPU designs optimized for low-latency sequential execution, GPUs adopt a throughput-oriented model based on Single Instruction, Multiple Threads (SIMT), where thousands of lightweight threads are organized into warps and scheduled across streaming multiprocessors...
samples.reference:
GPU 并行计算利用现代图形处理器高度并行的体系结构，加速具有高算术强度和规则内存访问模式的数据并行工作负载。与针对低延迟串行执行进行优化的传统 CPU 设计不同，GPU 采用以吞吐量为导向的 Single Instruction, Multiple Threads（SIMT）模型，其中成千上万个轻量级线程被组织为 warps，并调度到流式多处理器（Streaming Multiprocessors，SMs）上执行。CUDA 和 OpenCL 等编程框架通过 kernel、线程块（thread block）和网格（grid）等抽象暴露了这一层次结构，使开发者能够对并行执行进行细粒度控制。

性能效率在很大程度上依赖于对 GPU 内存层次结构的有效利用，包括全局内存（global memory）、共享内存（shared memory）、寄存器以及缓存。诸如内存合并（memory coalescing）、最小化 warp 内的分支发散（divergent branches），以及利用共享内存实现数据复用等技术，对于降低内存访问延迟和最大化占用率（occupancy）至关重要。同步原语（如屏障和原子操作）必须谨慎使用，以避免引入串行化开销。

从性能建模的角度来看，GPU 应用通常使用 roofline 模型进行分析，该模型将可达吞吐量与运算强度以及内存带宽约束联系起来。尽管 GPU 在诸如稠密线性代数、深度学习和科学仿真等高度并行的工作负载中表现出色，但 Amdahl 定律以及主机与设备之间的数据传输开销可能限制整体加速比，因此需要进行精心的算法设计和工作负载划分。
